reviews:
Be carefull rating this app low they retaliate against ppl who give bad reviews. This game overall 3 stars but I noticed if you give SCOPELY a bad review they will technically  give you a hard time at this game be very carefull, very money oriented,one upgrade at a time you no long er can sell old unused weapons for wood, we're once wood was easy now can't sell for stuff or anything for material. They design this game for buying customers only. They give you 3 star characters for token won, and now that's scarce as well, Very Very carefull buying coins some people don't get what they are promised and end up spending over hundreds of dollars on this app.   Full Review   
 Characters I tried for the Maggie today and pulled 11 3*s. With so many 4* and 5* I don't understand why you have to get so many 3*. So if anyone reads this don't waste your time keep your money or spend hundreds to get the characters you want. Also look at YouTube and see people pulled 40 and 40 3*s.   Full Review   
 Game STEALS your money Originally gave this game 5 stars, but the more you play the more money you have to spend. I bought a raid can and it didn't credit to my account. After numerous emails I was told that it was credited and that I used the refill. Total BS.   Full Review   
 When i walk the Dead stay Dead This game feels like your directing a episode of AMC Walking dead! Plus resource management and keeping your crew alive.Holy Rotting flesh!I peed myself! Got A code brown! Rick! Give me your cowboy hat!   Full Review   
 Blown Away It took a minute to get into it.  But once I really figured the gameplay out.... I can't put it down.   Full Review   
 Have alot of problems loading the dam thing made a great crew now can't play for some reason Can you help us out and let me know what the problem might be I don't wanna lose all my progress   Full Review   
 Great game but Its not letting me level past 20?? Is that supposed to happen?? I have factionmates that are 30+   Full Review   
 Expecting Drops Can we please leave the Expecting Loot Drop please. I'm  tired of trying to remember what the drops were. It would help to find guns in certain areas or loot to level up our character's.   Full Review   
  Could use some improvements. Able to pick up good characters and weapons more easily without having to spend money. People that even spend a lot of cash they still don't receive the better characters.   Full Review   
 Very poor management Hard to get on a schedule with this game, makes it very difficult to prepair for events, an 100 bucks is a waist buy something you can have to show for later on, 3 star characters for 100 bucks is whack, this game would make alot more money if they would give a lil bit, once someone loses that much money odds of em spending again is very slim.   Full Review   
 Endless Fun This game not only features a choose your own destiny, but also features an Ultimate Team-esque sense to it and also offers what Clash of Clan fans want. All that, you can play for hours before you're forced to wait, but it's an amazing game that I have nothing bad to say about. They hit it out of the ball park with this game.   Full Review   
 Lies Don't believe the "free" Glenn character and that it's a "$10" value.  He's original given like it or not from a token that gets you high star characters. Along with "collecting" your favorite characters you'll need to have a fatcat wallet to get anything remotely worth wild.   Full Review   
 Unhappy with Lost progress due to Update Overall I really liked the game , however I've LOST ALL MY PROGRESS INCLUDING MONEY PURCHASES AFTER THE LAST UPDATE . I hope this can be resolved i would still like to play the game. Also I spent money on your game one purchase of the 30 day 70 coins p/ day and only received less than a week's worth which is lost . The screen to start just can't load anymore please contact me and let me know how else I can help you fix the issue it's a great game and the first game I've ever spent money on Thanks   Full Review   
 Great game Only thing I don't like is that I personally can't find the value of spending too much money on this game.   Full Review   
  It is a good app to spend some time. The only thing that I am not agreeing upon is the really hard mechanism to get even a 4 star characters. If you don't pay you struggle and it is still not enough. Even the avid players make the app sell further. Time is money as well!!   Full Review   
  I love the game, but i think that the use of coins to get 5 star characters is a complete scam. Ive spent quite a bit on the chance. They debut a new epic recruit every day. It is a total scam. They even say oh double the chances. Yet there is no percentage of drop rate. I strongly feel that scoplay is being extremly greedy and scaming loyal players. And should be ashamed! The stars are soley for the great gameplay. But scoplay should be handing out refunds and appoligies like they roll out epic characters.   Full Review   
 Good game, cool illustration Stingy game designers. Epics far too rare, as in too low of a drop rate. We know where the designers have their eyes set: upon the money.   Full Review   
 Could be so much more I play Walking Dead, and well, the service for this game sucks.  Bad customer service, poorly designed features, and bait and switch character purchase mechanics.  Items one and three are directly related.  I went to the in game character purchase section.  Here, they have three different character screens and a weapons screen - Premier Characters (four and five star characters with special attributes and abilities.  Often big name characters from the comic book and the games from TellTale), Elite Character   Full Review   
 Need my game back Hey scopley I just received a brand new tablet today and downloaded this game on it, I play it on my phone everyday and am quite far on it I used y same email address and everything but it's making e start from scratch, I would appreciate it if you could resolve this an give me my game back I can give account code of my profile if you need it? -xander   Full Review   
 Great, but... I think it's a great game but can u mabye add the fear the walking dead characters. If u do that would be really cool. Thanks.   Full Review   
 It's like a drug You play it for free. Then you find yourself buying a few things. Next thing you know the only way you can play is if you pay more money.   Full Review   
 Fun & Addicting! Really fun game to pass the time with and if you watch the show it tells a relatively close but different story. Only negative I see with the game is that Daryl isn't an obtainable character.   Full Review   
 Love the game even though it's a total rip off and misleading. The odds on winning any tournament / war etc are basically 0%  there is always the same top 5-10 factions winning everything with whole 5* teams . The people and factions who are not massively lucky in obtaining 5*s from spending great amounts of cash don't stand a chance in winning one. I suggest that they need to make it more fair by taken the top 10 factions/ rank 11-20 rank 21-30 aso... From all regions and put them all together. That way it's more of a fair game .   Full Review   
 Waste of time ! It takes FOREVER to get a strong enough person to battle with. Not sure how long since i dont have one yet. On verge of quiting. Takes up ALOT OF SPACE ON PHONE snd you get nothing out of it. Play week after week month after month and spend gold and still can't get strong enough character to complete stages with . If you want to THROW MONEY away have at it this is the game for you. You would think they would give you a daily log on bonus like other games but the CHARGE $10 for it here.   Full Review   
 Cool game As a fans of TWD I love the concept of the game, unique and has a storyline, raids and mission, however buying gold in store is expensive, I'm in the philippines and only use smart billing so it cost much because of the 12% vat.   Full Review   
 You screw over loyal players You want people to spend hundreds and hundreds of dollars on this game but you CONSTANTLY screw them over and give them nothing in return. This $10 a month deal isn't even worth it because after saving up all thos coins, you people will still only give most of us 3 star people. Will never give you people one more dollar until you stop screwing over the players   Full Review   
  This game is ridiculously addictive. But it doesn't demand all of your attention just an hr a day lol   Full Review   
 This company is a rip off dont play this game Its funny how we are all complaing about how this game is a rip off and these idiots dont even have the guts to reply back to us this comoany is getting rich off the walking dead too bad kirkan couldnt sue them   Full Review   
 Very addictive.. but.. Been playing for almost three months now and i have no complaints with regards to the gameplay or the graphics.. it never freezes and loads very fast. But you need to pay atleast 3000 pesos for you to advance and compete with the other players who payed. Im from the phillipines so its very expensive for a 10% chance on getting an elite character.   Full Review   
 Sucks This game sucks it's no different then any other game you find on Google play. You have to join a group and people can attack you just like ever other game this game sucks its stupid!!!!! I'll stay with my walking dead no man's land instead it's been the best one so far then any game I have found on Google play!   Full Review   
 Wow Its a grinder game of repeating the same thing, and building a garden could take 12+ hours. Only the paying customers win any events, and you have to spend over $100 bucks to get someone halfway decent. The rate of getting a 5* character is 1/100, and you are more likely to get a 3* piece of crap.   Full Review   
 Money Rip Off!!!! Unless you're spending tons of money or one of their programmers hacking, then this game just gets disappointing and stupid... They rip you off and won't even work with you. I want my money refunded!!!! You can delete my account if that's what it takes!   Full Review   
 Great game! Edited 2nd April-  I've come to notice that it's nearly impossible to win the higher leveled missions and side quests the game offers. The minimum level of some of them are A++, and even S1 and beyond. But those levels are nearly impossible to win unless you have maxxed out 4 star and 5 star characters. It's rare to get those characters through free pulls, and leveling them above tier 3 is impossible without either winning or purchasing elite leveling gear.   Full Review   
 Addicted and spent no money I love this game. You can go all out and buy everything once you really get into it, but for me I just love playing and not taking it too seriously at the moment. Even though I have not spent any money on it I still get rewards and really enjoy the game.   Full Review   
 Takes way too long to upgrade, and not enough extras to level up...need to spend way!!! too much money and get the same crap elite extras...been playing the game since it came out and still could only upgrade one 4 star character... Getting old now, and spent over 500 on coins...willing to spend the money if it's worth it Would like it more if didn't take so long to upgrade things or take so much to do so and should get better rewards for missions, especially road map...spent 1000s of coins only to get a player I could earn after a month... ....kinda ridiculous....also should tell you what the top upgrade is for characters, upgraded several that were unnecessary   Full Review   
 Love the game BUT I am currently pretty upset because I installed the game on my tablet and it lost all my progress except my coins and region. I really enjoy the game and worked hard to do well at it only to be left with nothing now. Be very careful about trying to move device.   Full Review   
 Terrible customer service. Ripped off I spent over 400 dollars on this game. I know wtf? But I was a top player in a top faction. When I switched devices it made me start all over even though it's the same account and all my achievements and payment history  is still on the game. I have sent at least a half dozen messages for at least 3 days and no one has responded. Not even a spam response. I called Google play and they are willing to refund my money. However they will not contact the developer for the issue.   Full Review   
 No such thing as buying and elite character. Fun game but this system for buying new characters is extremely flawed. Will never spend a dime on this knowing if I ever did I would be baited then switched to an awful character after being advertised something much better.   Full Review   
 I enjoy game and comraderie found there It would be great to be able to compete with the paying players though. I've found if your not paying to play then you don't get those 4 and 5 star characters....if they change that.  Will give it 5 stars. Well I have gotten some four star character s but 5 star are still unattainable...I will add a star.   Full Review   
 Scoplied The game offers many ways to earn coins for offers, but also teaches you to say scoplied instead of screwed when you constanly get screwed on most chances of decent characters, otherwise good game love it.   Full Review
title: Walking Dead: Road to Survival

reviews:
It's my favorite mobile game but seriously arena cheats you by giving the opponent way more turns. You will be shocked when they get 3 to 5 turns per monster while you get 1 turn and maybe 2 once in a while. I am not exaggerating. 4* for this.   Full Review   
 One thing Could you guys lower the ammount required for a guild battle? I am in a small guild that doesn't have 10 people but we all really want to do guild battles...we can't seem to recruit enough people either   Full Review   
 Please fix it. After I use lollipop 5.1 ( infinix hot note x551 ) there's no way I succed installing this game I love the most. And I'm sure this happens to others lollipop users too.  Any solution?   Full Review   
 Expand sky arena Com2us. Please make another island [sky arena) . too crowded with 100 monster and building. Been playing for 1 year. such a life time gamer. Thanks.   Full Review   
 Please Wtf my box keeps saying i have a new monster when i dont and when i do i forget because its always on. Lets not even mention the fact I've been playing for two years and no nat five.   Full Review   
 unable to login on my account ive been playing this game about a year ago and I connected app to my Google account yet now when I login I login on some lvl1 account... is there any way to recover my old account or no?   Full Review   
 It takes too long too download I have been waiting more than an hour and it's only quarter way:so upsetting for such a good game   Full Review   
 One of my fav apps..but.... I cant summon monsters nor evolve. Doesnt even let me open the app now!! I have uninstalled and downloaded again and it still will stop saying network delayed and close my app! It sucks because now i cant roll the sice for the event!!   Full Review   
 NB*5 Give me com2üs more NB*5 monsters. Give me also Light Oracle Laima. Thanks. Asia Server, Username: MuSi|Ace.ph☀   Full Review   
 Com2Us Help me Pls!!! Good Day Com2Us, I would like to concern something, why I cant enter to the Game after I update it? It always says that Failed to Connect to the Server, even though im already using a Wifi Connection? And when I uninstall it, and reinstall and update, it keeps always say it again. Please Com2Us Help me Fix this. I really miss my Dark Penguin. T.T   Full Review   
 try to make it a little bit easy too many mystery scroll,hard to find a best monster. 50 times i'd try to power up stone,im  wasting a lot of mana stone for this but ive got not.im starting to hate this game   Full Review   
 Love it, when it works. I love you guys, but it seems every other patch ends with me not being able to play at all. I literally cannot even log on without getting kicked off almost instantly. P.S. Could you change the 2nd Fire Archangel I got to literally any other 5 star? He's without a home. :(   Full Review   
 Hate game I hate gaming companies (hold-em poker pro) that promise you that if you play tutorial of another game (summoners) that you would get 3,000,000 chips for completing the tutorial. I would give this game a zero but it doesn't come with one, so it gets a 1 .   Full Review   
 "Money wars" thats what it should be called... The game is fun but very limiting. Crystals and mana stones are the most prevalent resource but they are nigh unobtainable besides paying for them. The methods they do have to get them in the game; are useless. 30 hours to get 3 crystals, seriously? When it cost 75 to summon and cheapest purchase is 20. Summoning becomes impossible besides the lower level scrolls which say 1-3 stars but more like 1-2. Fun game if your willing to buy your happiness.   Full Review   
 Good time passer Love the style of the units and there's almost always something you could be doing in game. Just the RNG of this game is somewhat the weakest link that holds it back.   Full Review   
 This game ruined my life After so much time  so much money  I am sitting here constantly taking it up the rear end by com2us and its business model. which is the rich get rich and the poor remain poor this game has now forced my child my unborn child to go to public schools. This game now has made it so that I have to take out a second mortgage. I strongly advise that you avoid downloading at all costs save yourself from the madness. you would rather vote for Donald Trump then play this game for one day.   Full Review   
 Crashes I love the game but it keep crashing every time I try to log in. I don't know it it's a connection error or in-game bug but it says my game data has been corrupted and tells me to uninstall the game and redownload it. Is there a way that this could be fixed?   Full Review   
 Great Game but need some changes But you can make it alot better..I kinda feel summoning chances are low with mystic scrolls also packages  that cost real money are expensive,Also please minimize the channels so that they would be active  and also...appoint mods to look after every channel others all are fun   Full Review   
 SUPER LONG WAIT The loading screen took forever. I dont really like this game, but that is my opinion. Try it. Hope u like it 😴   Full Review   
 I used to love it... But It's been a week already n I can't play properly, I get error 106 and delayed Internet so much, the game droop n I lose my energy, summons, etc. I've done EVERYTHING to fix this. Even factory reset my router n cellphone. Nothing works. It makes no sense, I've had enough speed n my Internet it's OK, I play other games that require more speed n they do not fail or droop, this is just something you guys need to fix, until then I simply quit n unstaill, I love the game but now I get grumpy n frustrated, sucks   Full Review   
 Decent game. Not a bad game and it has definitely had some major improvements since I last played it. I would like trading added however. This could be done by friends only and could use some Mana Stones depending on the rarity of monsters. For example. To trade 5★ monsters it could take 750,000 Mana for both participants. 4★ could take 275,000, and any below 4★ could take about 100,000 Mana.   Full Review   
 Isn't it a little bit hard to get good monsters? I'm not sure about summoning yet but farming for a 3 star monster sure is hard though. I've had at least 45 runs in Mt Siz just to get the 3 star fire golem for chapter 3 due to enemies being wind elements, but seriously, isn't it a little bit too hard? I've just tried summoning using the "75 gems summon monster" and I didn't even get a single 5 star monster after summoning for 10 times. It really is hard to get great monsters in this game   Full Review   
 Unplayable Network delayed error has been persistent for at least a week making the game unplayable on s6 active.   All my other games work normally.   Great game when it works.   Also chat needs to be improved from the 1992 AOL style.   Full Review   
 Use to like it..now not so much How am i suppose to participate in events if i keep getting the "Cannot connect to Network" error ?  I have been trying to get on & unable to. I used to love it now im deleting it bcaude its very frustrating   Full Review   
 Epic game You play what you get. There is no form of trading whatsoever so basically you are on your own. At first glance I though this may be unfair but the thing is that as you continue to play you develop a team for different things being Raid, Guild Wars, ToA, PvE and PvP there is not such a thing one size fits all in this game. Every monster contributes to a specific roll that being DPS, Tank, Buffer, Healer or Debuffer is up to you to take your team to the next level.   Full Review   
 Great game Addicting,good game play and great graphics.The game got its problems it's not perfect tho.I have little or no problem with it.   Full Review   
 I live this game Best game ever since I haven't gotten a nat 5 yet I have built my dark phantom theif and he hits for over 50k. Also could you give us a higher chance of getting violent runes most of my mons need it and it's too expensive to buy. Also I would love lushen and praha  and raki in my next summin thanks. keep up the game and add some more transmogrify they are beautiful.   Full Review   
 OCCULT GIRL I hope I can get any OG when I summon ms.. thanks com2us.I still don't have any nat5 monsters :"( any element of this monster will do. Ign: gospyy server: global. Thumbs up for the update!   Full Review   
 Cant log in I've been trying constantly to log in but not successful. I know my account works cause ive logged into it through internet web browser and all. Im having issues atm and dont have a clue how to fix it....plz help   Full Review   
 Connection problems Lately the game its turning unplayable to me. Every 5 or less minutes it's disconnects or says "delayed connection". And it's not my Internet, it's working fine with other games. Please fix it and I will review my rate.   Full Review   
 Add friend battles Come2us please add a battle mode for friends to fight your real life friends..  PLEASE   Full Review   
 Great game. At first I thought this was just a waste of time gathering monsters and skill them up. But I would admit, this is the 1st time I got hook to a game. So hook I even ask my friends to design  our own jacket with our username on it. so that when somebody sees it they would know we play SW wherever we may go. I gave you a 5 star because I think you guys deserve it for creating SW.But sometimes I want to give you a 3 or 4 star because of frustration of stil not getting an NB5 monster when newbies already got it.   Full Review   
 Great game but... Was a 5* rating but here recently I have connection issues the entire time, while every other app i have runs great. Please fix this and I will change rating. I have android.   Full Review   
 But one thing In the next update you should allow us users to trade monsters with each other but only if your friends I hope you can add the feature oh and also can you make it not so hard to get good and strong monsters in the game please add these features and suggestions to the next update the game will be better if you do so   Full Review   
 Nat5 rate so low When I summon, all I get is bullsit. cant you just let me get a Nat5 I want? Why give me all sorts of crappy nat5. I wasted all my time effort just because of this bullsit. I hope you can increase my account YuukiAsuna from Asia a higher rate of nat5   Full Review   
 Mystical scrolls are super crap, you need to open 1000 for it to have a nat 5*, come on, give us more Mystical Scrolls drop and higher chance of getting good monsters... Mystical Scrolls drop rate needs to be highers   Full Review   
 Unfair summon rates I've been playing for about 1.5 years and no nat 5* still. At first it was ok because i was at least getting 4* monsters but now it seems like even that has stopped. I haven't seen lightning in the last 40 mystical scrolls I've opened over the last 2 months and my interest for this once great game is now diminishing. Hopefully there are going to be changes soon. But until then this game only gets 3* from me. ***update*** server: global name: darknessflame1 I'm glad to report that i finally got a nat5 thanks   Full Review   
 MY LAST REVIEW Hi Com2us. Pls fix or buff Juno. This will be the last time. Seara's skills are well paired to itself. Juno's passive with her 1st skill...which increases her atk bar when critical, does not pair at all. Juno's turn will activate too fast for the enemy to apply harmful effects on her, leaving her passive useless and UNACTIVATED. PLS...FIX HER.   Full Review   
 Great game, but.... I made a crystal purchase and it told me to log into an account to secure them and when I did, it didn't give me my crystals. Please help.   Full Review   
 Great game My only issue is 5* chance and rune powerup percentage. Maybe a buyout option on powerups like buy the next level for 100000 mana   Full Review
title: Summoners War

reviews:
Its good you replied, really hope a new update is awesome this time Trust me, just adding xmen deadpool etc.. 5 stars and earning money for u is a sure thing. I know that u did nt added some hero is because some how some reason.  But think far.   Full Review   
 game is great Good job on the game. Wished we had more heroes and villains. Hopefully there will be more characters to choose from other than that, i enjoyed it so much and its keeping me busy   Full Review   
 Good I got the Iron fist costume and it said hero not found plez fix this and I will give this 5 star😭 and can you make so that we can get all charters like carnage through biometrics and can you plez add the x-men and deadpool and every other marvel chariter and you should be able to make your own chareter with biometrics   Full Review   
 More Character Why there's no X-Men character? I want Deadpool and Wolverine..4star for now..   Full Review   
 THIS GAME IS ADDICTING!!! I Really enjoyed this game alot as soon as I started I feel in love the first 15 mins and found myself playing all night. I lost track of time. I've been waiting for a game exactly like this. Im so excited to continue playing.   Full Review   
 Maintenance Are we still under maintenance or am I having a problem. I can't wait to see how awakening your hero's works.   Full Review   
 Nice So far so good, if you could add the X-Men and deadpool it'll be great. Hoping for further update that will add more heroes and villains.   Full Review   
  Love, Love Love this game, when I can play it. In the last 15 mins the game has force shut down 10 time. Cannot play at all, so frustration for such an awesome game. This has been a constant problem since the 1.7.0 update on two different devices.   Full Review   
 memory hog! so sad for the new update. cant play this game anymore. im a big fan of marvel but i had to force unistall this game due to the update goes to my internal memory & not to my sd card. the update is too large to fit my internal memory. previous patch for update is not like this... how it come to this? PLEASE! fix this or is there any work around to fix this? hope you guys help me out, i know im not the only one whos having problem like this...   Full Review   
 Arena Issues! Since ur last update all the games under arena are unplayable. They make the whole game restart. Please fix. And when will u add deadpool? When will you bring the old timeline battle back?   Full Review   
 Great It's a really great game, but the maintenance after each update does get really annoying since I wanted to check out what the new updates brought. I also feel that the amount of characters you could have on each team could be extended. I wouldn't mind a five man team.   Full Review   
 Need for improvements I am unable to play the 2nd mission of story mode. The game quits suddenly on its own. Please fix this. Also the game takes a lot of time to load. Please do something about it.   Full Review   
 Update is too big It eats up the tablet's internal memory, but not the available space in the external/sd card. Can't even play on my tablet now, pls help   Full Review   
 It's awesome The game play is very interesting but it also lets you skip the dialogue 😁. But I wish it would let me get jewels or gems or whatever easier   Full Review   
 Awesome but... I love this game but why are there no X-men included...they need to be on here I would love to team up wolverine with Jean grey and gambit....also with the new civil war update it's lovely but why can't I play the journey growth and I'm still now able to play the world boss missions please fix and or respond asap   Full Review   
 Wtf Dat big civil war update went to my internal storage making it low storage😬😬😬😬..I had to delete it😭😭😭😭it was 1 of my favorite games..plzz do something🙇🙇🙇   Full Review   
 Very impressive optimization Gameplay is smooth on high settings on my Z3 although I keep it on medium for reduced battery usage. The heroes are balanced and the quests are exciting and worthy of mankind time. Very good work, dev's   Full Review   
 Great game Some. Things are confusing almost feel like I get a free hero of random level almost everyday lol. After recent update got screwed keep getting security error code 3 something like that and had to unistall and reinstall and now have to restart all over   Full Review   
 Game is awesome Love the story and customization, the number of heroes to collect and regular updates and social level... Wow!! Surprised me   Full Review   
 Awesome I've played this game for about a year since it started and it's awesome but this is the only problem I've ever had with the daily check in, it didn't give me my 6 star rank up. I was wondering if you could fix that for me   Full Review   
 what's up with that stupid "change set" iso-8? I've been playing this game for a little while now but the probability of getting the right set for iso-8 is so low, never have I seen any of my characters ran through a "prince of lie" bonus and it's just so irritating. I've been farming for this since last week, accumulated and lost almost 7m and still cant get it, maybe there's something wrong with the script. come on guys, you're better than this   Full Review   
 6 stars skill needs to be on every hero Its a really an enjoyable game tbh and the progression isnt so hard either but one of my biggest problem is a hero(modok) that ive dedicated my 3 months on getting it to 6 stars is quite frankly trash compared to other heroes, i wish the developer to fix these by giving all the heroes skills, until then you should invest on only the competetive heroes.   Full Review   
 Amazing! The new update was amazing! Im really like it! but there is one thing wrong about the number of entry in battleworld.. Sometimes i realized that there are two different battleworld in a day but sharing same amount of entry which is 20. The entry should be reset once it enter the new battleworld event eventhough it is in one day. Please fix this netmarble.. Btw, im very happy with the update and excited for next update!   Full Review   
 This is what it should be Now that what I call a perfect #game #awesom graphics #awesom effect every thing is jst trependly great .I m playing this game on my lenovo k4 note with #Antvr_theathermax Nd the game is look like that I m in that aweom developers #keep it up make this type of game more and more Nd get updated soon #thanks   Full Review   
 Love the game This game just keeps getting better and better, hopefully I would see a new spiderman and iron man costume. And maybe add some xmen character and deadpool. Overall best game by far on play store for me.   Full Review   
 Good I really love this game but I can't do world boss they set the barrier to play way to high and the 7 day special reward with proxima midnight is useless if you can't play world boss soo please make it easier to get 1(level) dark black matter to the people who can't play it but other than that 4 stars   Full Review   
 Update 2.1.0 There is a problem in version 2.1.0.I can't update because the additional update uses up my phones internal memory fully which never happened before .I played this game for more than one year since its launch and now what do I do.fix the problems and I give u 5 stars.my phone Symphony Xplorer w 130   Full Review   
 Fun! Its actually a pretty good game. Got it to kill time but now I play it everyday.   Full Review   
 Was great. Not so much anymore... After playing this game since just after inception I have to say I am disappointed. I put a lot of time to rank characters close to maximum. Then World boss is added... The characters I spent so much time on don't even put a dent in the characters they have added. Why play a game that there is no chance of you getting anywhere without dumping tons of money into it. This game has become a unapologetic cash grab for netmarble. This game was great. Not so much anymore...   Full Review   
 Doesn't work because of update I have been trying to download this game on my other iPad because it has more space but it will not allow since the update. I will never download any of net marble games if they don't fix it   Full Review

 Star Wars - at least Disney & Lucasfilm says so... Story: 3 (you are a smuggler in the Star Wars universe between RoJ and FA, the story arc is okay.  Not great, not bad, okay.)  Gameplay: 2.5 (interface is often wonky, errors occur frequently, force closes happen weekly.)  Freemium: 4 (it's hard but you can complete the game without paying for anything.  But it will take FOREVER.  That's not an exaggeration, end game requirements will force you into direct competition with people who have been playing since launch and you have to rank in Sector Battles for "Event Crystals" to meet upgrade requirements.)  Sector Battles: -2 Competing directly against people who have been around so long they have literally every item in the game, is hard.  But to get the advertised Force abilities or Lightsaber you WILL have to compete for event crystals.  Even then, it will take months.  Customer Support: -75 (a team of rabbits weasels with sore teeth would be more friendly and helpful.  They treat you as if you're a liar trying get over on them because their game is perfect.  Of course, when the "multi award wimming" game director, their boss, calls people who give harsh feedback a bunch of whiners, what do you expect?)  Pass this game up.   Full Review

 Typical carrot on a stick Simple progression grinder, nothing special but an adequate time killer. Just accept you will not get any where fast in this obvious cash cow and be patient. When South Park did the freemium gaming bit, they were satirising games like this, so fair warning. The controls in this game are really poor, often taps not registering or the character not going to the designated point. That is really the only difficulty i've found in this game, fighting the controls is what makes the game any challenge, and this is not how it should be. The challenge should come from well designed content.   Full Review

title: Star Wars™: Uprising

reviews:
I originally gave this game 5 stars, but after playing to lvl 90 in 2 different servers, it really got bland.  First, after a server has been around for a good amount of time, you will end up with maybe 2 guilds, and way less than 100 active players. Which gets boring. Second, I started a new server because of that. Well there was a bug, and some players took advantage of it, and were basically removed from that server. In the end, it killed that server, I would say there were maybe 50 or less active players by the time I left. It was completely pointless. My problem is, they keep these servers going, so some noob might join a server, love the game, and actually spend money on runes, just to find out, it's a dead server. They need to merge servers when they get below a certain point, or it makes the game pointless.   Full Review

title: Darkness Reborn

reviews:
〰〰〰🌟 A MATAEUS REVIEW 🌟〰〰〰 I never, ever thought I'd uninstall the original game, but this version has progressed much further in a direction more suited to my tastes. Full props to the original developer for building an excellent foundation, but Shattered feels, to me, like the logical extension of that blueprint. The  only downside? I'd like to see a lot more achievements! Maybe one for each badge? The current ones are rather generic!   Full Review   
 Very good game Just... Rip Warrior as op class XD   Full Review   
 Best PD mod ever!!! Very nice update on reworking warrior class =D Hope you can rework or buff Huntress too which is still underwhelming   Full Review   
 Perfect Absolutely free, full game. Always being upgraded and made better. I've killed loads of time playing it   Full Review   
 great like how new things for newest update   Full Review   
 Awesome! Very addictive!   Full Review   
 One of the only fun mobile games I've played Unique toolkit for each class, complex build potential, awesome class mechanic interactions. This game is especially amazing for travels since it requires no internet connection. A+   Full Review   
 I love it, but it killed the franchise for me. With 1 goal in mind, 100 tries in, desperately, I beat the only boss that drops a persistent item in the game. He does not in this version. Otherwise, this is an upgrade in many ways to the original, I love so many things about this game, but when it comes down to it, I need that drop, and the original doesn't cut it for me anymore, this ruined it, so I guess I quit.   Full Review   
 One suggestion If mage will have an artifact like an empty spellbook that needs scrolls to be of use then game's heroes will be balanced   Full Review   
  Dev: The warrior's badge loses its power when you upgrade to heroic armor.  The warrior's armor should be upgradable. Also, consider having the badge carry two or three upgrades. Right now, the warrior is underpowered because his combos don't give him enough offensive capability. His defense is supposed to be strong, but the badge is weak.   Full Review   
 Never A More Roguelike Roguelike Shattered Pixel Dungeon, and it's similar mods, are the most fun, fair, well thought out/executed Roguelike games in mobile gaming right now. Brutally difficult, it still rewards good strategy and play choices. Absolutely punishing, it brings an immense feeling of satisfaction. It embodies the traditional RL genre by allowing players to learn through their mistakes, but without giving every vital piece of information. It's a mystery, that is more and more fun to unvelop. Play this game. Prepare to die   Full Review   
 The cursed wand that makes everything youre wearing cursed There were some mechanics of the game that were changed or altered that I disagreed with, but accepted, but this is too much. It is unnecessary and needs to be removed completely. There is no point to this being a thing. Wearing cursed stuff was a pain but it was always a risk when equipping an item, but a wand that makes all your equipment cursed? The wizard class was already nerfed super hard and now it's pointless to play wizard entirely. Remove this from the game. People plz rate 1 star until they do.   Full Review   
 One of the best rogue-likes I can sum this up as an addictive challenge. Five stars due to lack of bugs, the sheer fun I have playing it, and being completely free. No ads! You aren't required to buy anything to keep playing. There's no irritating stamina mechanic limiting your play time. You can play as often and as long as you like. Sometimes frustratingly difficult, you will feel compelled to either learn from your mistakes or to uninstall the game. For those who enjoy the challenge, a fully realized dungeon crawler awaits.   Full Review   
 Really does well at that frustrating rouge-like feel Finally beat Shattered after about 100 runs and some frustratingly close calls. It's really a game that you play, rage quit over, later on remember how much fun it was, then rage quit again.   Full Review   
 New updates are great! Thanks for updating the game frequently! Not all game Dev. can do that :) .   Full Review   
 A fantastic game You like roguelikes? This is for you. Shattered is  in my opinion even better than the original PD now. And it just keeps on getting better.   Full Review   
 Absolutely a great game I've had hours of fun with this game, and it is by far my favorite roguelike so far. However, gnoll scouts are just a little too difficult to deal with in the beginning because I find myself low in health due to starvation. Playing the old warrior taught me to ration between floors, but that habit has not translated well to other classes in response to the warrior nerf.   Full Review   
 Really appreciate playing it but what does the Blood Chalice really do??? Please tell what it does and if it does nothing DEV's please update. Also Huntress needs a bit better stats to be playable.   Full Review   
 Love it Easily the most replayable roguelike on all of Android. Only game I have kept on my phone longer than a week. Tight gameplay. Good wiki and explanations. Decently challenging. Good play-arc ie early, mid, lategame distinction. Best of all the pixeldungeons.   Full Review   
 Mod of the original If the original is good, this will be greater.   Full Review   
 Awesome! This is an amazing version of pixel dungeon! If you like rogue-like games than you can't let this one pass you by.   Full Review   
 I love it, but it needs more. It is a really nice mod of the game, but I think it would be better if you added a new area.   Full Review   
  More food still starving to death in the later lvs but a year later im still entertained by this delightful game! Best game for free ever!   Full Review   
 Great game. Beat it on 89th run. Challenge time. Question regarding locked doors. Are there always keys on each floor to every door? I swear there have been a couple runs I've checked every possible wall looking for a door, possibly holding said key but to no avail. I just returned to a floor I was referring to and used a scroll of magic mapping. No doors missed and no key to the locked door. Glitch or what?   Full Review   
 Rpg on steroids Good   Full Review   
  Love it   Full Review   
  Superb!   Full Review   
 Boring Its boring   Full Review   
 Best modified pixel dungeon out there This one has the best graphics, no ads, awesome artifacts, I love it! Hoping some time in the near future you will add another class!   Full Review   
 Good, but... Still my favorite version of Pixel Dungeon, but recent "rebalancing" has made it much less rewarding. Having unlocked the Tome of Mastery for every character felt like an accomplishment, and then you just take that away due to "balancing issues"? And now I hardly even bother with the ghost because her rewards are NEVER worth it. Spear +1 on two subsequent runs? I see why she can't beat a single fetid rat. Edit: More often than not, Mimic loot is cursed and degraded. Wasteful.   Full Review   
 So much harder than original Frustratingly addictive, only beat L5  1 out of about 15 so often want to throw phone at floor. Can i suggest that the phone vibrate when you are hit and life is very low? Dying because i forgot to look at health is not fun. The new font look great, nice and crisp maybe people don't like it because it is no longer '8 bit' text?   Full Review   
  Awesome!!  ...and stupidly addicting.  Really challenges your creative and tactical thinking skills as you're forced to squeeze every iota of usefulness out of every item you have in your inventory...no matter how useless it appears.   Full Review   
 So much love The original pixel dungeon was fun as hell... the first hundred times. Development screeched to a halt on that one, and it almost seems to me like shattered is someone getting passed the torch. Constant fixes and tweaks throwing new wrenches in your runs, and the best part, I think, is how it has all stayed true to the realistic no-nonsense style of the original. This. Is. Perfect.   Full Review   
 Best Pixel Dungeon Out There Hands down the best Pixel Dungeon out there. Really good balance of difficulty and constant updates makes this a solid way to kill a few minutes.   Full Review   
 Difficult but satisfying as heck! So what does this game provide from the original "uncracked" version? A slew of new mechanics, items and some major gameplay changes. Best part is, it works perfectly; the amazing original got an upgrade and it is simply glorious. Just adapt to the difficulty curve and start exploring.   Full Review   
 Fun and addicting, tons of hours of dungeoneering! I love it, I love the challenge. It's a great way to sink tons of role-playing hours in. It's great, although a few performance bugs interrupts the floe of the game, this happened with my Oppo Mirror 5, random pauses with sharp popping sounds even on mute. I don't know if it's because of a custom Android OS, but if you can fix the bug, it'll be extremely helpful! Thanks for a great game!   Full Review   
 The definitive pixel dungeon option Game is hard, really hard and to be honest I've been playing it for years and I still don't know how it all works, but it's a fanstastic, possibly the best rogue game out on android, I've not tried a ether one, well done Evan!   Full Review   
 I like this game, a lot. This game Is great, it has such good replay value, and its so tough, I haven't beat it yet.  But I would really like to see new stuff, just, raw, new stuff. Items, trinkets, enemies, mabye even a new class. I love this game and I love how you all used to update this game a lot, please don't lose interest in this game. I love you all.   Full Review   
 Entertaining, but difficult. A challenging game, easy to pick up and play, but almost impossible to beat if you're unlucky. With randomly generated floors, items, and enemies, this game is great to play when waiting in line.   Full Review   
 Finally Well, I finally found the smartphone timewaster I was looking for. After *only* 2 years, I managed kill the boss and get back to the first level. However, while I know it's intentional, it's too much luck based. I love it when the game rewards me for being clever, and I feel down when a string of bad luck wastes a good character and I can't do anything to prevent it other than pray that some of the unidentified items may somehow save me. Keep up the good work!   Full Review

  This could be a super epic game.  Initially I played it and the simplicity and ease of play and amount of time needed to feel progress is perfect.  However once you get to tier 4 weapons and armor the rng grind becomes fairly harsh.  Getting lucky on an ornate chest is very rare and the item drops even in tier 3 special are very poor compared to what is needed.  I have gotten a ton of useless fuse gems as well which I can not fuse up to tier 4 which should be fixed to allow it.  So ultimately I am at one of those places where I am stuck on progress which makes me less and less inclined to login and play.  The curve is too harsh and the rng is not that forgiving. Suggestions: Allow tier 3 to 4 fusion for gems.  Up chance of better drops in higher dungeons and at higher levels.  Lower gold cost of traveling merchant fuse crystal (post 45+ you need tier 5).  If your not going to change drop rates decrease difficulty so progress can still flow. Add new enemies there are far too few. Your goal is to keep people interested and smacking them at post 40 with this harsh curve unless they are very lucky or buying diamonds just adds potential we will quit.  Tons of free games out to play.   Full Review

Last the pvp, its so absurdly one sided its pathetic. Needs completely reworked.. could be a great game.   Full Review

title: Finder's Keep

reviews:
Great old school Dungeon Crawl! I'm throughly enjoying this game and it is extremely satisfying when you complete a difficult dungeon. I'm just curious if there is a way to delete your characters somewhere in the main menu.   Full Review   
  DD is one of those games that just keeps coming, one of the few that the dev actually updates on a reg basis, sure it's hard, but if you have ever really played a true rpg, ...none are easy, nore meant to be. You need decide what it is YOU need to make it. Everything you do need is there, and at no cost to you, but finding it can be tricky best not to give up what you thought was a waste or was it?   Full Review   
 Great Game I have never reviewed a game before BUT got to say Fantastic to this. Eye Of Beholder gamers will love it. I would great if you made a *DEADLY DUNGEONS 2* or added more levels to this one.   Full Review   
 ALERT A Non Free-memium game. An actual fun game you can play and enjoy. Great little dungeon crawler for your phone or even better for your tablet.  I only wish that they would release an extension.  I would buy it in a heartbeat.  The best thing about this game is the level of game play complexity is perfect 👌.  Not to simplistic to be boring, but not to cumbersome to play on a mobile device.   Full Review   
 Cool and simple :) Please do continue improving the game, it would be a waste if you would stop :(   Full Review   
 Deep and loooong dungeon crawl Wow, this took me a few weeks to beat, not something I would expect from a phone game! I was looking for a game that played like the old Might & Magic (not Heroes) and Wizardry RPG's, and aside from having only one character to control, it was pretty darn close. My only complaint is that I wish the shop keeper was available more earlier in the game. You can get stuck without a key if they break quickly, which means backtracking a few levels. Good job though. Please make a sequel!   Full Review   
 A great game! I purchased this game this game over 4 years ago&I love the fact the dev constantly updates& improves the games. Diverse monsters&char progession. Responsive controls. The only bad thing I can say about it is that I did sit on a pile of gold. I wish the merchant had better loot & gamble option. All round super great game Thank you for making this, I really enjoy it :) Edit: In the next update I would really like to see what the percentages per skill point actually do.   Full Review   
 Deadly Dungeons I've been playing dungeon RPG's for the best part of 25 years, my old favourites include "Eye of the Beholder-Temple Dark Moon" This game is simply the best dungeon crawler RPG currently available on any phone/tablet. Bar none. I've completed the game many times on all difficulty levels, and I'm nowhere near being bored! The developer is a genius. All we need now is a sequel, or an expansion pack, I would gladly pay for either! Please, please......Sir, I want some more!   Full Review   
 Amazing! This is the rpg I've been looking for! Now we just need some epic games done in this style. :)   Full Review   
 Great! Got this years ago when it first came out and feal a little ashamed for not giving a review. Its been my favorite dungeon crawler ive ever had on my phone or tablet. Developer is awesome. He's constantly and painstakingly tweaked and updated this game on a continuous basis for years. It's been a pleasure to play. Here's wishing u perfection with this gem of a game.   Full Review   
 Overall enjoyable so far I've only played a short bit, but it seems like a competent dungeon crawler. My only complaints are 1) the fog isn't on your mini-map, which makes it hard to tell where you've been without constantly opening your full map. 2) There are no icons on said maps to indicate where doors or items are, making it easy to forget to go back and explore while collecting goodies along the way. 3) This is more of a nitpick, but it'd be nice if there was a scrollbar to indicate your inventory is more than five slots.   Full Review   
 Eh... It's a by the numbers rogue-like in first person view. It doesn't do any badly, but it doesn't do anything to be it's own thing either. Just a big bowl of vanilla ice cream. But good ice cream nonetheless.   Full Review

With new game plus and permadeath option for replayability. my only con is a balancing issue, prepare to get one shotted by magic. A lot. Fear mages. Resist gear is near useless (with a bonus of 22 and 24 end the first mage duo I found instagibbed me) and makes dps or strafing utterly essential. Without exaggeration currently my fav app and one Im glad to have bought.   Full Review

You can see any enemy's stats by tapping on their picture under the attack button. There are enemies you can barely get through a fight with as a low level player that won't be able to damage you any at all later on.  Things may seem high priced early on but a little later money won't be an issue and you will have more than you need.   Full Review
