 Awesome, but a few problems Devs need to pay more attention to the game. A great game is where the devs actually listen to the players that are paying them. My big issue at the moment is the cost and availability of coins. Gems are pretty fairly priced. But coins are outrageous! I have seven EP creatures that are ready to be evolved into Legendary, but the cost is one million coins each! Not only is that a bit ridiculous, but $100.00 in real money only gets you 600,000 coins. And gaining coins in the game is too slow. 5 stars if fixed   Full Review   
  P2p and ofc p2w, Just another copy scam. Hard to evolve with artifacts(chances of getting uc or above artifacts are very very low) because they even made artifact packs cool scam lol. There are better games don't bother installing, 90% card games in the market are just trash. This type of games are garbage, nobody should ever play them and rate them 1 star if you mistakenly ever played. Not in 2016 su*kers.   Full Review   
 Lost purchase I bought gems and while it was processing it crashed I got charged but did not get gems I contacted them about it and they have not responded its been three days   Full Review   
 Glitch I am A level 54 and it will still not let me use my 5th slot for a creature. Everytime I try it resets it from the server.   Full Review   
 OK seems it will be fun A couple things are a little not so great about it ..but nothing to make the game bad so far it's fun to play I would recommend playing it if you're into these kinds of games and looting   Full Review   
 Loved it I loved this game all the features. However few things can be added like the skills of the creature which I can use manually   Full Review   
 Pretty good This is a great game. The mechanics are nice and the system is stable. However there is one problem, the character slots are reset once you close the game. Even though I am level 20 i cannot change the monsters in my 3rd and 4th slots. I can only change the monsters in the first 2 slots which are unlocked at the beginning  of the game. Please fix this, this really could be a five star game.   Full Review   
 It's ok... Difficult to understand at first.  Especially if your phone dumps during the tutorial.  I haven't found a help section yet.   Edit: Really don't like the integrated PvP in the quests.  I generally don't go after peeps that are unbeatable, yet the PvP forces me to.   Full Review   
 Cool Cool.  Fun.  Cool   Full Review   
 Some of the levels are screwed up Some of the levels like fairy forest level 2 are broken because a blockade thing is blocking me on either side so I can't do anything. If someone knows how to fix this tell me. P.s. I'm not asking people to call me stupid it's the easiest thing in the world only advise.   Full Review   
 Kinda Cool Game started out cool but I've reached the ever dreaded stale mate.  Repetitive BS   Full Review   
  Good game, hard to figure out how inventory works, came in 3rd in pop session, but couldn't find what I won!   Full Review   
 Different kind of RPG Not too bad, really. Doesn't beat you to death asking you to buy stuff.   Full Review   
 Interesting Got boring since you can only evolve creatures so far and the only way to get better ones was to pay   Full Review   
 I like it, but... Great game but I've just gotten to the 4th or 5th level and it's too hard to win. Seems a but ridiculous to step up the difficulty so quickly.   Full Review   
 If you haven't played, DON'T DOWNLOAD Only good thing is its fast automated gameplay. Luck-based gameplay sucks, PvP SUCKS, grinding sucks, items and coins quickly becoming obsolete sucks, Legendary creatures being next-to-impossible to get SUCKS. The game teased a lot of things but actually offers almost nothing. If you haven't touched the game, DO. NOT. START.   Full Review   
  Only been playing for 10 mins, but it brings to mind some RPG's from back in the day. So far, so good.   Full Review   
 Dungeon equilibrium Bought two times to get six hundred jewels but they took my money but never gave me my jewels I would have put a higher star rating if they would give the jewels.   Full Review   
 Ok Can't play anymore. Loading screen never ends whenever I try to go home to do upgrades. Broken game.   Full Review   
 Amazing but I dont like having to use wifi all time. Pleasssse add offline mode   Full Review   
 Great Great game for lonely evenings or boring lectures 😉   Full Review   
 So far so good Might make it 5 stars if it holds my interest a while longer   Full Review   
 Slow & confusing Hard to understand what you are supposed to do and there are way too many loading screens. Not fun.   Full Review   
 Very fun! I've played a variety of rpg games (blood brothers etc...) but eventually I stopped playing because I got bored. But this game is different. The art style is so unique and the combat is fun. It's awesome.   Full Review   
  Referral code is 3c52a3a8. Add for bonus stuff! Decent game. Like that I can play it without using the internet.   Full Review   
 The Game I like the game. It's really fun and addicting. Good job!   Full Review   
 Fun game I like that while advancing through the floors each step you take is a surprise.   Full Review   
 Great! Little crazy at first! Once you get a hold of things it's a great way to kill time   Full Review   
 Love the theam After some initial instability the game has smoothed out and is running fine now   Full Review   
 Good but Items for items for upgrades be like. You need luck? Haah lel.   Full Review   
 Solid so far Interesting play style, I've been looking for a new quality game   Full Review   
 Gd concept Good game so far turn based gd not lag issues or anything   Full Review   
  Good game, fun to play. Not playing long but for now is fun   Full Review   
  love this game. I would play all day if I had the energy!   Full Review
title: Dungeons of Evilibrium RPG

reviews:
Extremely poor performance Since the newest updated that was pushed recently, it's now running at a complete slideshow. In combat it's running at 2-3 fps on an LG G4. I love this game, the mechanics, even the mechanics, but the game is completely unplayable on a snapdragon 808 equipped phone, which is powerful enough to play the latest games, 3D or otherwise. Until this is fixed, I am uninstalling the game and rating 1 star.   Full Review   
 Awesome Pause menu would be beneficial, but I'm not complaining. What's that online alpha function about? Actual multi-player or just leaderboards?   Full Review   
 Some fixes still needed 1) There is no way to pause, the app and its music always runs in the background 2) I think adding multiple character slots would greatly improve the experience 3) cannot access overworld map 4) Boss achievements don't work 5) lags horrendously on my Moto X-Play when attacking, maybe add an option to turn off damage numbers? otherwise quite fun.   Full Review   
 An interesting sequel I did not expect to see the sequel to one of my favourite childhood Flash games end up as a full on Legend of Zelda homage. Credit for such an interesting and fresh sequel. It does feel a bit too easy, something I believe has been fixed with the update. There is no way to pause this App either, the music will continue. Traversing the overworld can be tedious but it's all a part of the quest. So, 4/5   Full Review   
  When I try to get in the game the screen goes black   Full Review   
 Still no lag fix See above, emailed dev and they only said, "that's weird.". Ummmm can you fix instead of just stating it is weird?   Full Review   
 Not for me It all seems to work ok but was rather repetitive. Not my kind of thing.   Full Review   
 Just a small problem Despite Google play saying it is in version 2.5 when I download it I get version 2.2 which could be fine except for the fact it keeps crashing. It crashes randomly and is on a Bush 4 (obscure android phone) EDIT: still not sorted AVOID   Full Review   
 I've put off buying this for so long... Honestly a really fun game. My only issue I have is the controls, but that is me, I'm not a big fan of tap/click to move controls. Over all, super fun and love how you're just tossed into this world and must figure it out on your own. Love it.   Full Review   
 F'n Awesome! Needs more content & polish! To start, landscape orientation without screen rotation enabled. Can't wait for III! Love it! An overall improvement of the first... Though I read it's too short..which I wouldn't know, because I'm grinding like there's no tomorrow. Needs instructions, if not just a basic outline of controls & stats. The campfire restores health, but does it save your location and stats/gear. Tap repeatedly to spam attacks. Heart grants extra life. Coin transfers after death. No official exit or save progress button. Wish it had some sort of stash, to save equipment permanently, regardless of death.   Full Review   
 Back to 1 star for Special Boss Glitch I had to make this 1 star again because although the boss glitch that freezes the game is fixed, the special boss you can choose to fight at the end (the whole heart tombstone and purple guy with red sword boss) is glitched. Although he does not attack or move, he is invincible. He'll take damage, but it doesn't do anything to his health. Made a one star so this would be noticed.   Full Review   
 Love it well worth the small purchase Thanks you for fixing the boss freeze bug it works perfectly now I've just beat the game and restarted over having beaten many bosses and worked perfectly. There is a small amount of lag with stealth enemies ghosts and such but that's it. 5/5 and again thanks for the fix! EDIT: once your dexterity gets high enough that you crit 100% or more lifesteal no longer works and I assume it's the same with other stats lifesteal is essential but does not proc on crits so it never procs once you get high enough level   Full Review   
 Pretty good but poor controls Has some great elements but the tap to move controls completely kills it and makes it frustrating to play. Targeting enemies also feels a bit clunky and frustrating. Music, art, and the general idea for the game are great. Can be a bit repetitive after a few deaths constantly starting from scratch, wish you kept more than just the money. Maybe stats or skills or getting some sort of special item or bonus depending on how far you get. Layout and dungeons are not randomized either which adds to repetitiveness   Full Review   
  I tried very hard to like this game. Combat is fun, random equipment and leveling up is fun. Game world is nice. Dungeons are well made. But the game has a glaring flaw. No way to pause the game. Even if you hit the home button to minimize the app it continues to run in the background. Enemies can continue to chew on your character, etc. Hitting the back button in game doesn't do anything. Only way to close it for sure is to also remove it from the recent apps list. Annoying.   Full Review   
 Awsome, sort of? Different every time! Or so it seems. there aren't really many differences every time you play. And after you beat it. It turns into weapon and armour collection. Also every enemy needs buffing because they are way to weak. And make the bosses unflinching because THEY die if you constantly click on them. But it's still fun though!   Full Review   
 Awesome * control is too loose. Must say I'd prefer this to have better ability to face enemies.  Perhaps press and flick to change stationary facing direction?   BD2 to is a real-time roguelike  2d side scroller. It's a loot fest & a dungeon crawl. When you get new items they appear on your character, the art is cool, and a little cute but still badass.   Full Review   
 Great game when it works. Game was great on my Nexus 6. Unfortunately the game lags to an unplayable state on my Nexus 6p.   Full Review   
 Problem running on xperia z5 When I attack an monster or just be in a fight a have big drops on fps, also when I lvl up I have the fps drop. Can you fix that?  I did not have this problem on the xperia z3.   Full Review   
 Great game. Needs gamepad config option. Gamepad seems to work, but we need to be able to assign buttons or the default buttons need to be updated. Can move around but can't pick up buy or select menu options. This game is epic pease add this last bit of support!   Full Review   
 Greatest roguelike ever If you're a fan of Dark Souls or any other hardcore dungeon crawler, this is the game for you.   Full Review   
 The awesome child of TLoZ and Drk Souls I'm really waiting for the day that online mode will be avaible!   Full Review   
 Doesn't work shield tablet Controls do not work on shield tablet.  The movement controls work but buttons do not work with no way to attack, access inventory etc.  Please fix, my son loves it on PC so I bought for his tablet to be met with huge disappointment.   Full Review   
 It still say 2.2 I've had this for a while and want to know why it says 2.5 on Google play but it's 2.2. There is no up date and also when will I get to see the online game play of this. I see noting new.  The phone I have is a Galaxy s5   Full Review   
  Controls could use a bit of improvement - often until I hit something I am unable to block / use weapon abilities when in a new room.   Full Review   
 Meh Repetitive game play. Good game, but needs a pause function. My lvl 45 died while I was replying to a text message.  If anything,  at least make it pause when you switch out of the app.   Full Review   
 Question. Ok so i like it. But as you probably know by now. People see it as repetitive. I kinda have to agree. But my question is, whats the "online(alpha)" thing in the options? I cant turn it on. It just stays off.   Full Review   
 Crashes It's been crashing a lot lately on my Note 3. I've run the game before with no problems but recently it just doesn't function properly. Otherwise a fantastic game. I love it, please fix it.   Full Review   
 Why! Why! I really want to play this but it keeps crashing on my phone....  So i never get further than the start area.   Full Review   
  Love this game, however, I just upgraded to a Nexus 5X and now the game lags like crazy. 2 Stars for now, 5 stars if this lag bug gets fixed.   Full Review   
 Have only played the first area, loving it so far I played games like dark souls and bloodbourne and no game other than bit dungeon has been able to deliver an experience almost as thrilling.   Full Review   
 Fantastic Game get harder and repeats after the final boss. Very high replay value.   Full Review   
 Laaggg Lagging horrendously on my nexus 5x. Was working perfectly in pervious patch. Hope 2 see it resolved!   Full Review   
  Thanks for fixing the bug also the best rogue like game i have ever played   Full Review   
 Repetitive, Again It's a large improvement on the first game but it still gets to the same repetitive aspect. After about an hour or so you get most of what the game has to offer really. You fight big bosses but you mostly don't have to do much other than keep clicking them and trying to out-dps them.   Full Review   
 Lag on LGG4 I loved bit Dungeon and this game seemed promising but for some reason there is constant lag everywhere. No way to fix it it seems.   Full Review   
 Quick response time Thanks for fixing that bug! Great game :)   Full Review   
 Awesome I love it but it needs cloud because i made a lot of progress and im going to switch my phone so please add cloud!!! Or can you guys add like downloading savestates so that people with cloud storage or an sd card can move save files to another phone? Please reply!!   Full Review   
 #1 game on android no complaints Hey developers! WHEN/IS MULTIPLAYER GOING TO BE CREATED? My brother and i have loved this game since it came out a year or two ago but have always been intrigued by the idea of multiplayer. Just wondering if there was a time frame on it   Full Review   
 10\10 It was worth the every penny can't wait to so your new games.   Full Review   
 Nice game I feel like for such a short game a bonus would be hard achievements to earn to help maybe sometime in the future. My main reason for posting this is because of all the one stars I saw about bosses. Bosses are fine with newest version so please, don't overlook a great roguelike because people can't be bothered. All in all its awesome   Full Review
title: bit Dungeon II

reviews:
Cool. This game is always different between levels and the monsters within each level, although minor setback is if you have a blutooth keyboard it wont move the character (W,A,S, and D keys) every other button works. Hope youll fix and continue updates.   Full Review   
  After playing, Delver immidiatly became my favourite game on my tablet. The touch controls really brought down the game though, so I plugged in my blue tooth keyboard (although the review below said it doesnt work, either the Dev fixed it, or just the type of keyboard) and I used the keyboard to move, pick up stuff, and attack, and used my other thumb on screen to look and manage my inventory, and the game really shined. I love the atmosphere, and pretty much everything about the game. But when you get to the cave levels, they are a little too open and with the beholders it gets really cheap and overly difficult. After watching PC gameplay this issue seems fixed, and Im hoping eventually it will be on here too.   Full Review   
 Looks good, pretty challenging. The graphics are nice and nostalgic, and I dig the music. I really dislike the controls. Ranged combat is tough because it can be hard to aim at an opponent far away. Melee can be tough because the attack button is in a weird spot. I kind of wish for turn-based combat. Enemy casters and the beholder guys ruin every game for me. Hope for a resistance potion, or you're starting over. Hopefully I'll find the right stat balance to get me through those fights.   Full Review   
 Great I love the game I would by any from the developer like this the problem is on tablets and phones the controls and monsters coming at you to fast to beat them cause the controls are akward to use on a phone or tablet this games perfect for pc but I only use a phone now, and play mostly on android there must be some way to even the playing field against the enemy's on phone maybe making it possible to sneak up on them idk   Full Review   
 I really love this game but... It needs some love. The developer hasn't updated it for over a year which would have been fine if it was a free beta however there is a price attached to it. I have searched for information and found nothing. The Steam version appears to be the favored son, recieving regular content and bug fixes. I would easily give the game 5 stars if I could get a straight answer on when and if an update is coming to the phone version or if it has been abandoned altogether.   Full Review   
 Won't install. Freezes after getting to 100% of download package. Will not install and because I tried again after refunding and rebooting my Galaxy S2 and got the same result, now the Play store wont give me the refund option.   Full Review   
 A very fun rougelike RPG I'm impressed to see how far this game has come now. The graphics look so much better, there is RPG choices to make when leveling, the UI got better (thanks for letting us know what potions do what now), and so much more. It's a really good game now and I can't wait to see what comes in future updates.   Full Review   
 Needs something Really great game but please add box breaking that will make the game a lot better please add! I will give 5 stars if you do! :)   Full Review   
 Movement issues Would be a five star for sure but my character gets locked in starring positions which results in killing me all the time, also if arial combat was a little simplar, the flying squids are almost impossible to kill   Full Review   
 Very nice but outdated. This game is very much fun, and I love the artstyle. But buyers beware, this is not the same as the steam version. The mobile version is almost a year old with no updates since.   Full Review   
 Great game, but... I love this game but they haven't updated it in over a year and a half now. The PC version on the other hand, is updated quite often. This game has been abandoned by it's developers. If you're buying this game and updates are a must have, then you may want to reconsider buying this game. If not, it's still quite fun even though the PC version has more content.   Full Review   
 One of the best dungeon crawlers out there! Im liking the whole randomly generated world idea. The permadeath can be a little slow, but overall a great game. Would be great if we saw this game become moga enhanced!   Full Review   
 Oh god my life This game is by far the greatest game on mobile devices. I don't care if you've never played a dungeon crawler, or a first person game, this is amazing. It puts the difficulty of dark souls, the beauty of 8 bit original game graphics, and the classic architecture of a dungeon crawler, this is the ace in the hole   Full Review   
 The Big 4 Minecraft, Minicraft, Legends of Yore and DELVER! All must haves.   UPDATE: Holy cow, this game keeps getting better! Insane replay value, a simple modern nethack c: really love the graphics!   Full Review   
 Awsome Great game but how about getting rid of those hearts and putting an actual numer for hp plus how about a status sheet to gauge when im leveling up next or want to see how my charecters states are. Other than that great game and challenging, I keep dying but oh well, ill make it sooner or later :)   Full Review   
 Great dungeon crawler If you're into dungeon games this is an absolute must have. Only downside is that I'm having a problem using attack button on my moga using keyboard emulation. Cant use the pivot app because the HID setup is wrong for it.   Full Review   
 Fix the gamepad issue You have native gamepad for PC? Why not implement it for this  Port it's to long over due since the games been out so long and not hard to include...please fix it   Full Review   
 Great It's a great game, however, I really hope the newer features of the PC version eventually make it over to Android, like the breakable crates and the chunkier cave structures. Additionally, an option to use the Android "immersive mode" would be nice. I'd gladly donate if such improvements are ever implemented, and hopefully I wouldn't be the only one. I bought this game twice, once on Steam and once here, and since I no longer have a PC I'm hoping the Android version hasn't been abandoned.   Full Review   
 Tilt controls maybe? I have a crappy single touch device.. might be playable with responsive tilt controlled look/turnand assignable function keys. More options would be nice like auto face attacker- anything to ease the chaos seeing as how this is 'fp' but not a 'fps'.anyway to hasten the loading at start?   Full Review   
 I keep coming back (to life) for more! It's funny how a few simple game elements can just click to make a great gaming experience. Deliver is that kind of game. Rogue-like dungeon crawlers can't get better and simpler! I got to floor 8 and got blasted to smithereens by a new enemy... But I'm not even mad! Let's restart and get payback!   Full Review   
 A great game. I was skeptical at first but decided to go ahead and try it. Best purchase I ever made. Its a very good dungeon crawler with lots of randomization and a strange addiction setting to it. Awesome. Runs smooth on Moto G 2nd.   Full Review   
 Best Game on Android I play Delver all the time, it's great to play for fifteen seconds or an hour. Controls well, looks great, and is an absolute blast! Keep it up, the constant addition of new stuff keeps me coming back for more and more.  One thing: MOGA pivot support would be a dream come true   Full Review   
 PC port that needs some fixes Add support for game pads. Shield owners I would pass until issues are fixed. There is a horrid issue with the inventory pointer showing up and then you are done for. At this point pretty much a waste of money. Fix this and I will gladly update this review.   Full Review   
 You did it.  :) Single best rogue like on the market.  Replayability: endless randomization of dungeons: awesome.  Graphics pixel licious perfection.  Liquid smooth  implementation.   Music .  Beautiful. .. white Wolf?? Right? :)    followed this from the beginning.   When you updated to the pc version it became Pinnacle of any Android rogue ever made.    It's amazing.   Thank you.  You have a Hardcore fan here.  Priority interrupt.  Any chance down the road you will update boarding party in the future???   Full Review   
 Love the game, but having issue on my new s5 I really like this game, and used to play it on my Droid1, 2 & 4. I recently switched to a Galaxy S5, and the game seems to have an issue where I am always moving backwards, making it somewhat unplayable.  Hopefully this gets sorted out soon.  Thanks for the continuing updates!   Full Review   
  I like the game.  It's fun and challenging and fresh every time.  I used to play the PC version back when that was free (a few years ago or so).  I intend to get the PC version again on Steam and be able to play there.  As for the Android version, controls are a little difficult.  Attacking can be difficult when the button to attack is hit in the same area as looking around.  Would be nice to just tap the screen to use a selected item/weapon.  No GUI, just any tap on the right side attacks.  This would make it easier to manage battles.  Also, will there be Moga or any HID support for the game in the future?   Full Review   
 Awesome The only thing is that the controls are so hard to use. The attack button is so freaking small, awesome game but controls are bad. Also it would be cool for like a continue our something because of you die you don't have to start from scratch again. But this game has a good concept.   Full Review   
 Make online This game is really fun I just beat it and it is still really fun looking forward to new updates. Would be really fun online. Recently tho I have experenced laggs and errors on the file I beat the game on. Please fix and u will get 5 stars   Full Review   
 10/10 IGN This is an awesome game with rogue like aspects like when you die it's permanent and you restart. The goal is to get to the bottom kill the necromancer then bring the orb back up to the surface. Sounds easy right? Right? Wrong. It only takes one step to screw yourself over. Either step on a pressure plate, drink a bad potion, run into traps, ect. I think this game is awesome and I strongly Recommend it to any fans of the genre.   Full Review   
 Great Dungeons Adventures Thanks to the yogcast I found this game. It just simple RPG dungeon fun. Its simple to play but challenging at the same time. Thank you for a lovely game   Full Review   
 BRAVO its great to see an update that hasnt ruined an app. this is probably the best dungeon crawler game ive played. anyone reading this should just stop reading and dowload this game already. However the game has crashed on me twice and corrupted my save. Both times I had over 300 coins   Full Review   
 Amazing I love the game, and play it any chance I get. I've played more than a few hours worth over the last couple of weeks, and I love every bit of it, except for one error in the dungeon gen. I've noticed that a teleport trap sometimes gets placed in a one way hallway, and it teleports you back to a place you've already been, forcing you to restart and delete the world. Once this little thing is fixed, I can safely say this is the best game on android.   Full Review   
 Hopefully it gets updated eventually Like the new features in the update but unfortunately the game can get so choppy at times it's unplayable.  I understand it's still in development so I'll wait and hope it gets better.   Full Review   
 Coooool Love this game more than most on the  google play store, but there is a rather big glitch I encountered. I bought a jeweled sward of speed from the merchant at the encampment, and it would not hit any enemies. All other weapons would, but not my 200 gold piece jeweled sword!                                                               Edit: Using a Bluetooth keyboard doesn't allow me to attack. Every other button works, but attacking doesn't work on any key.   Full Review   
 Great potential! I understand this game is still under development .That said, for what this game already is, I'm impressed. The developers are taking this game in the right direction. KEEP IT UP AND KEEP UPDATING :D  To buyers: Obviously this game isn't a final product and needs refining, so be wary when purchasing this app. Limited content!  To dev: Would like to see a more variety of enemies, weapons, and armors. Also expand on the magic dynamics as the "magic wands" are essentially a ranged weapon and nothing more.   Full Review   
 Good game, but gets kinda repetitive after a while The controls are as good as you can get on a touch screen. It's a fun game but after a while the simplicity of it makes the whole experience somewhat repetitive. But I recommend it nevertheless!   Full Review   
 I freaking love this game An amazing roguelike that I've enjoyed since its initial release on android. I've beaten it many times and still never get bored, and the continued updates make it even better. I would like a little more variety on the bottom levels though,  especially since the 7th floor is exactly the same every time.   Full Review   
 Good stuff... PLEASE ADD MOGA CONTROLLER SUPPORT!!! I would really like to double tap to auto-attack an enemy for melee and an aim assist for wands. This would REALLY help with playability. I can't hit anything with wands.... a tiny dot reticule would be welcome. Update: the wands have a crosshair, but only when firing... Which defeats the point. Please fix and have constant crosshairs!   Full Review   
 Great Bought this one on Steam, as soon as I found out this have Android version I think no further. Instant purchase!  Why no iOS version tho? I'll buy it for my iPhone as well.  Oh also would be great if we can sync saves between devices probably using Facebook or Google or something.   Full Review   
 Fun to pass the time For the money this game is great.  I own it for both my mobile and pc.  It's not cutting edge or ground breaking but if you are a first person RPG fan it will keep you entertained.  The music is good but loops too much(not a lot of variety).  The graphics suite the game well.  Caststers make the game diffcult and probably have a few balancing issues to be worked out.   Full Review
title: Delver

reviews:
Awesome! Great fast work devs!   Full Review   
 Awesome game Love it.   Full Review   
  Nvida shield controls don't work   Full Review   
 Good There is a bug on nvidia shield, every time I walk downwards it opens up my skill point a little annoying but other than that good game!   Full Review   
  Great game great customer service   Full Review   
 Looping Dungeon Repetitive. In twenty minutes you'll see every thing this game has to offer. The enemies and bosses repeat every four levels. The dungeon's main layout never changes and leaves no room for any exploration. Not worth the time or money.   Full Review   
 Glorious It's dangerous to go alone! Do it anyway! Fantastic creation of nostalgia, difficulty, and playability. I have only one complaint: when picking up items, the text is often underneath my thumb. Annoying, but not critical.   Full Review   
 Zelda's dungeon crawling + arcade + roguelike Fun, fast, frustrating. First it lulls you into thinking that it's way too easy. Then you die from a silly mistake and are taken aback a little. Bite your tongue. Then you die again. Ok let's get serious aaaand you're hooked. Only thing I feel is missing is a scoreboard of some kind.   Full Review   
 Amazing game Love the concept of the game. I can keep playing it forever even though it is repetitive. Leveling up and getting equipment to defeat the soul eater to get your wife back is an awesome aim for the game and the gameplay wil make me come back for more!!!!!   Full Review   
 GOD THIS IS AWESOME plz add an option at the end of the game (if there is an end) to keep on continuing endlessly becuz i love this game for its awesome loot and give me a sense of progress and if it ends then playing will have no point as i will have to start all over, and i dont like that..... please create and endless mode to continute for ever to my heart's content this is the one of the only games that makes me happy plz........please😦   Full Review   
  I've spent a LOT of time playing this game and having fun but there gets to be a point where I want some kind of quest or at least a goal,  not just endless grinding.   Full Review   
 〰〰〰🌟 A MATAEUS REVIEW 🌟〰〰〰 The animations are nice. The music is nice. But that's pretty much it! It's just a clicker, and I didn't expect that. You drag treasure chest items into your inventory, and tap as fast as you can on monsters to despatch them. No quests, no sense of reward or progression; heck, there aren't even any instructions. It's just plain old boring, simple as that. Don't be fooled by the screenshots, as I was, into thinking this is a Zelda clone. It most definitely is not.   Full Review   
 No substance Good graphics and interface but let down by the total lack of story, engagement, feeling of progression or basically anything. All you ate required to do is mash the screen and that's it. Badly needs a story, interactions or something to hold my interest. Look at the Banner Saga for an epic game.   Full Review   
 Fun little dungeon crawler I like this trend where Indie game devs are releasing their PC games on iOS and Android as well.  This one's been in my Steam Wishlist for awhile, but now I can play it on the go.  Great little C2M (click-to-move) hack n slash rogue dungeon crawler.  If you've never played Zelda before (...seriously?), this game was obviously influenced by it, and will appeal to fans of Zelda, Binding Of Isaac, etc.  Grab this one, beat it, then get the sequel!   Full Review   
 Fun and addicting This game rocks.  Brings me back to the old days of playing Zelda on NES and SNES, and playing nethack on my Linux box.   Full Review   
 Classic! Addicting! Good old fashioned hack and slash. Like how the game auto saves after dungeon completion. Once I figured out the drag and drop chest system my frustration gave way to elation!   Full Review   
 Fun but Glitchy Developer has fixed all the glitches. Very fun to play and find new items.   Full Review   
 Great game I really enjoy this game, but I recommend that the developer add a separate multiplayer mode that is double the difficulty that you can clear with your friends   Full Review   
 Utter waste of money There are no instructions. There's a chest i can move, a potion i can drink, and door that doesn't open. WTF?!   Full Review   
  Great game. Just needs more variation. But I believe that comes in bit Dungeon II.   Full Review   
 My gammmmmeeee I haven't gotten past level 4 but I love it   Full Review   
 A little bummed Not quite what I was hoping it would be. It's pretty repetitive.   Full Review   
 Laggy I played this on my last phone and it was fine but on my droid maxx 2 it is so laggy I cannot play it please fix   Full Review   
  Best ios game I've ever seen   Full Review

Please add an options menu to enable gamepad support manually and if possible a custom control assignment.  Love this game though.   Full Review   
 Super! Ekstremt simpelt og bliver af uforklarlige grunde ved med at være sjovt x)   Full Review   
 I played this before on my iPod._. When I saw it available for my device I said "awe f*ck yeah!". :3 buying this up.   Full Review   
 Awesome! I'm having a great time playing the game!   Full Review   
 Awesome Provides hours of fun.   Full Review   
 Too Easy Well done and fun at first, but it devolves into a simplistic grind fairly quickly.   Full Review   
 Love it I really enjoy this game a lot   Full Review   
  Repetitive but damn fun   Full Review   
  Lame   Full Review   
 worth the 2$ needs these things though. personal leaderboard too like like to bost alls it needs now is settings, classes, more music, maybe a pinch option(maybe not),so on the phone when i try to look at loot it needs 2b when i press on it moves up like 3 or 4cm so i can read whats in it. thats all cool game, maybe a difficulty setting too. also the enemy's can you make them swarm on me please i want to feel like they really are trying to kill me lets face it im going to terminate them with extreme prejudice it would be nice to feel like they are too. bosses maybe or could be harder.   Full Review   
 Crap buggy Keep getting pushed out of rooms and frozen into empty rooms during boss fights. I have restarted the same level 3 times now...enough of this.  Delete.   Full Review   
 Awesome Loved it since it came out!   Full Review   
 Great game Best game   Full Review

Totally reminds me of playing all of the dungeons in the first Legend of Zelda (which I played over and over again numerous times).  I highly recommend it!  And it plays great on NVIDIA SHIELD!   Full Review   
 Great game but... -1 star: Pressing d pad down or the left thumbstick down shows stats.  Like pressing y.  Why?   -2 Stars: And why must I force close just to exit the game...   Full Review

title: bit Dungeon

reviews:
Won't open!!! Look, I love this app, and have played about 40-50 hours on it, but the last week or so it won't open no matter what I try, it just opens with a black screen and then crashes!! I don't want to lose my data!! I will update with 5 stars if someone can help me!! Because I do really think its a great game! Well worth the 99c when it works!   Full Review   
 Fun and addictive It's really fun but when I got to seacean I caught him and forgot to save so I went back to go capture him again, he ran away and he won't respawn.Same with Blix   Full Review   
 LOW RANKING CREO Unless you want to BUY creo from the store, you're going to be spending most of this game looking at pretty crappy creo summons. Which is funny since the game requires you to buy it to play. If we have to BUY the game (which i honestly prefer over free to play IAP) we should be able to find rare and powerful creatures for free. But anything 4 stars or higher either runs, or resists the link capture no matter what unless you have a dominous, and it'll be a cold day in hell before you even find one 3 star +   Full Review   
 Awesome.......just awesome! I really love this game. I see this game getting better and better. Keep up the great work.   Full Review   
 Kinda Weird Ininstalled this app, and it was awesome. Then I got to this place and a weird future guy appeared and he said we met again, i dont know if you did any changes, but it got me all messed up. Still, I have been enjoying this game since I bought it. Awesome, and worth it game,   Full Review   
 Ok As much as I enjoy the game, it has some common spelling errors in the dialog. Not only this, but having healing moves for every creo kind of ruins the fun. People can heal all the time, making battles last forever!   Full Review   
 Best Android game PKM inspired Great art in general, great characters and creos art, neat battle system, great variety of scenarios, fair prices for the complete game and DLC. Although, the OST is very limited and repetitive, lack of guides (the wiki is incomplete) and some paid itens not being available for you to acquire through game play take some points. Even though, 5*.   Full Review   
 What's new? Hi, is there something new in this game? I get bored when play this time. There's no one can beat me now.   Full Review   
 Amazing Game! EvoCreo is an awesome game. It has a fun story and is quite challenging. EvoCreo may be like Pokémon, but it is very unique at the same time. I've already recommended this game to several people. If you're a Pokémon fan, you should definitely give this game a try.   Full Review   
 Help I'm stuck in the forest trying to get to hydro city but I can't find how to get there is there some sort of bug? I have been trying for the past 20min to go and I can't the arrow tells me to go down but there are just trees there   Full Review   
 It's OK but.. When I go online to battle people it only lets me battle for like 5 seconds and then mess up.I would put more stars if this wasn't an issue.   Full Review   
  I can't pick up the prime gems the little red ruby thing what's wrong   Full Review   
 I love it This is an amazing game its worth 99 cents other games that are inspired by Pokémon have to do with energy bars which is annoying but this one is different its challenging and fun and I just love it and if you guys made a squeal I would be so happy :)   Full Review   
 Worth paying 79p This game is great fun and brings a unique battle system, no more 5x flamethrower in a row.  It's Challenging, especially trying to catch creos as if they are 6*+ they have a habit of running after 1 link attempt (tip: put them to sleep) I have experienced 1 problem though, when I'm in a menu and press the back key (on my phone - not the app) a few times it sometimes goes to a black screen and I have to force close and re-open the app, loosing everything since the last auto save. Tho It isn't game breaking.   Full Review   
 Help!!! After making an undesired purchase in store and returning to the main menu (without saving) I'm finding myself continuously ripped off by not getting my Gemma back even with autosave off. This is very very very annoying as the only way past it is starting an entirely new game which I've done more than 5 times now. I don't think the developers want the game to inconvenience their customers so much that they want them to start a new game for every episode of wasted gemma. Please fix.   Full Review   
 At least you tried It's cool until you realize your attacks barely hit 50% of the time without a status affect; your status affects don't affect the enemy at all; the get to use their moves more often; and just wait until they start healing themselves! Man are you in for a 45 minute treat that you probably won't win because they heal themselves every other turn. But, the creo are definitely not lacking, and the gameplay is great. A little buggy at times (d pad has a mind of its own sometimes and the creo sometimes disappear)   Full Review   
 Horrible The game is a joke I sat for two hours with a level 99 creo against a level 60 the thing was unbeatable due to the fact 8/10 of my moves missed or didn't flinch it once..ended up have to forfeit and lost 19k money disgusting it's not the only one every fight I do 8/10 moves miss I paid for the game and do enjoy it sometimes until I have to fight as I know my moves will miss if use fix this def five star until then I wouldn't even recommend this game to my friends   Full Review   
 Simple Small bug, response needed* I beat the game and got both expansions, beat the first one (shadow hive) and now I'm on the alphite expansion. The text reads that I need to defeat a big dragon prime creo, Instead of defeating him, I caught him instead using a 100% catch rate orb thing and it still says I have to defeat him. Just a small bug here, send me an email back please I'd you can fix this, I'm sure it's not that bad but I really want to see what happens next I'm absolutely loving this story.   Full Review   
 Great game Wonderful and well thought out story,  reminds you just enough of your childhood to pull you in but it puts a spin on it and offers some great improvements as well.   My only complaint would be in the evolutions.  I find them to be silly at times and sort of cut and dry.  I say this because you'll see that many resemble the same concept as evee in the pokemon games. Add more creo and make it less evee like and 5 stars from me easy.  Definitely worth the money.   Full Review   
 Great Monster Hunter I have tried my fair share of monster hunter games. This one is the best. Worth every penny. Great game play, great monsters and tons to explore and do! Keep it up! Can't wait for more updates, and sequels! Every update just has more fun monsters to find, and reveals more story!   Full Review   
 Online trolls When I first go to battle online, people disconnected 3 seconds after the battle starts. I first thought this was just a small issue about connection and unfair creo's. Then it got frustrating, I met the same guy all day and he have a volcadon, A VOLCADON while I only have 1 Singlish. And what did he do? Disconnect on purpose evrytime. Can you guys do something? Add like a anti troll delay or something like a penalty? I'm getting sick of trolls. But overall the game is pretty good ;)   Full Review   
 I LOVE THIS GAME! Soo simulator to pokemon and I love pokemon (but not the show only the very first series was good now meowth sounds like a gangster and team rocket is smart) getting full version love dis game. Play this game if you love Pokemon battles and cool monsters! 😍🐉👑 (love, monster, crown for royal and the best) this game gets a thumbs up and I rarely give thumbs up! I am on a role on this game, I mean I caught blix and I found another prime creo. Also (I don't know what to call these) I caught 2 shiny creo! Or blue feel because they were blue idk know if they were genecticly modified creo but whatever, I caught a blue illuvian and a blue triopus. 😃😃😃   Full Review   
 Overall, Great! Although... The game is addictive, which is good. Meaning that people want to continuously play this game. But for me, sometimes the app just shut down, and I get frustrated since then I lose all my progress I've made. It's so frustrating since all the hard work you did in that time period, is wasted and useless. Would've been a 5 star if it functioned better.   Full Review   
 Good game As a Pokémon fan I'd say this is a pretty good game. the game has its differences from Pokémon and feels like it's own game. the Creo look cool I just wish there were a bit more to choose from. One thing I feel is that the Creo you get from the farms are better than the ones you can catch. some Creo need to be buffed stats wise or add new Creo's to the game to make it more interesting. other than that this game is good and id recommend this game to other Pokémon fans.   Full Review   
 Best RPG experience I've had in years! The story is fairly in-depth, the dialogue is actually dynamic, and the monster progression system is very unique, and is still easy to use. The battles are actually fun when walking through tall grass, and there are no Zubats trying to swarm you in caves. The Cloud load/save feature is definitely a life saver, and the multitude of avatars you can choose from are awesome! Worth so much more than what the price tag shows.   Full Review   
 Google plus doesn't work amazing game but when I pull out my creo from the storage I and use them in a battle the game freezes so im stuck to the first 5 creo I obtain   Full Review   
 Issue resolved, great game Fantastic game so far, updated to 5 stars after issue being fixed. I couldnt sign in to google play for a cloud save on one device, but then it started working. Im thinking maybe it was because I had the other device running at the same time? Idk but its working now. Pokemon fans will enjoy this alot. If this game gets updated frequently this could be amazing. Im laughing at the people complaining that it's 99 cents haha. So worth every penny.   Full Review   
 Creo won't learn new moves This game has amazing graphics, a decent story and is a fun way to burn time.  However, recently, everytime my creo "learn a new move" after leveling up during battle, I see no new moves at all. And from what I can tell , either no one else has this problem or has noticed it. I notice that in the info page of each creo , there are 3 slots for moves other than your five current ones. No new moves are learned after that.  The tutor isn't helping, and its a huge pain. Will rate 5 stars if this is fixed.   Full Review   
 Its ok Eh theres a few bugs where it freezes when a battle is about to start and i have to restart the game to get passed it, and there should be more animations, Creo, and more places   Full Review   
  FANTASTIC alternative to pokemon, one of the best games on android.   This is similar to pokemon in many ways but there are some differences that I like that I think 1 up pokemon.   For 99 cents you can't go wrong. You can cloud save and play this offline too.  It's completely fair if you don't pay for premium currency, it's not necessary at all. You can go through this game just like how you can go through pokemon. There's perks you can get for your trainer too so you aren't hindered.   I plan to support this game further.  This developer has earned my respect.  BUY IT if you like pokemon style games, you have basically nothing to lose but 99 cents, even then there is a 2 hour refund window on google play.   Full Review   
 sucks now that I purchased it The free version didn't have the annoying store button or the gem counter up in the corner. I'm dissapointed in that. I just paid 99 cents to play a full version that now expects me to spend more money on it? This is kind of a cheap and dirty tactic. I want a refun, or the stupid store option turned off on my game.   Full Review   
 Crashes Ya know i.actually paid money for this game. And the game itself is a great game. But it crashes so much in the middle of a battle. Find a way to fix this and I'll jump to 5 stars.   Full Review   
 Great game. Usually. I loved the game before the most recent update. The little arrow that floats around your character is really annoying. I would please ask that you add a way to remove it. I would suggest adding a option menu below the quest line helper in the options. I am sure theres other things that could potentially be added as options as well.   Full Review   
 Switching devices Don't buy can't switch between devices if you do expect to Lose all Everything your purchases and gems and all your rare creo were developers can't do nothing about.. I SaY please don't waste that dollar   Full Review   
 Very Bugged.  Never spend > $1 on this developer. I transferred my files to a new device and premium stuff stopped working correctly. My bought creo do not learn pre evolution moves anymore. It's impossible to fix since the premium devolver only devolves lvl 5 creo. Spent $27 on the entire thing. Support cube ($20) gives logs as "rare" items. It's impossible to get the best creo (10*) unless you spend money. The 4 skill points you have left in the end is pointless. The devs respond once per month but did not offer solutions so far.   Full Review   
 Next Update I really love this game. I hope in the next update there will be new maps and creos. I hope new updates will keep coming.. Best game I bought.. This is the first one though :)   Full Review   
 Creative I love the work put into this, it's a great game for a dollar. I've noticed though with updates, freezing is more apparent. I was in the title screen and it crashed, 5 mins in game and it crashes. Hope you guys are working on it.   Full Review   
 nicely done developers the game, it was amazing there were nothing wrong with the game and no bugs and the animation remind me of old games and a little tip for the developers stay awsome and doing what your good at and ignore the dislikes.   Full Review   
 This must be a glitch? There's something wrong with the game. I haven't seen a single wild creo with a star ranking above 3. It must be a glitch, right dev? Everyone should avoid this game until this glitch is fixed - in its current state it appears to be an unrepentant cash-grab that expects you to buy creo to progress in the game. I'm sure the dev isn't stupid enough to turn away customers like that on purpose, right?   Full Review   
 Holy Cow! I honestly did not expect to get this involved in what looks to be a Pokémon clone (but isn't a clone, I like this battle system better!) Way to go!   Full Review

Garbage It "was" a decent game.....until half way through, it stopped working. I played for hours and now every time I open the app it just brings up a picture of a small temple on a cliff by the water and freezes...it stays stuck on that screen no matter what I do...so zero stars....I only gave one star in order to comment , but i take that one back too.  AMAZING!!! I'm a BIG fan of Steven Universe. I heard of this on YouTube and looked it up and it WAS THERE!! I got it I loved it and I just got 100% on every world   PS: please make new episodes PLEASE !!!   Full Review

 Great game missing one key thing This is a fantastic port but I have one feature request. Could you include play games support for saved game files. I have had my entire progress wiped twice, with one of them being when I was on the last level.   Full Review   
 This makes me love Steven Universe even more! So much action and it has a nice balance of challenge/not too challenging. Plus I love making my own choices in the conversations you get to have with the crystal gems and the leveling up is so amazing. I played this for hours and didn't notice it had been 4 hours and I still have 3 levels to make 100% I would definitely pay to play more levels as well as more characters and different gem fusions. You get your money's worth guaranteed. Recommended for any age totally!   Full Review   
 Enjoyable for everyone Being a huge fan and long time supporter of Steven Universe, this game was a must for me when i first learnt about it. And its everything I could ask for (I replayed and mastered the game around 8 times and i ♥ it) Grumpy studio together with Crewniverse did a great job. Characters acts same as they would during the show voicecasting is perfect, they even use quotes said during episodes and humor is fantastic! (Pearl's "Are Pee Gees" are very funny XD ) . I have to pinpoint music and colors, its beautiful.   Full Review   
 Great ideas...I guess that's it I will honestly say that as a person who couldn't get into the show, I found this game to be...pretty enjoyable for what it was.   Full Review   
 Good but could be better Needs an update it's very good but if anyone's like me they get bored of it once finished give an update and I give 5 stars ★★★★★   Full Review   
  Could someone make ghe glitche stop cause i love this game and steven universe too but o wwnt someone to fix the weird freeze of the temple when nothing works i was ar the red world and now i cant play anymore please help ; ( and it would also be awesome if u could add more things like fusion between the gems u want like pearl and amethist that make opal by example please and thank you :)   Full Review   
  By far the best mobile game I've played to date! Sequels please!!   Full Review   
 It's an awesome game..with some software quirks. The game itself is amazing, the gameplay is so fun. The software kinda ruins it a bit. I start it up and it has a long cut scene and I want to skip it. If I do, it disables my touch function? What? So I have to watch it every time. The other thing is some audio hiccups. All around its awesome, so pick it up kids and cartoon loving adults alike!   Full Review   
 So much fun! Lovable characters, an interesting plot, challenging battles and exciting items! Awesome awesome game, and I generally don't enjoy RPGs. Highly recommended and well worth the money. The only tiny grievance I have is that the graphics could be improved quite a bit, but that hasn't hindered me from loving this game whatsoever.   Full Review   
 New attack idea I love the alexandrite idea but I think it would be cool if there was a attack where you could fuse just garnet and pearl, just amethyst and pear,and just garnet and amethyst, that would be a idea I would love to see I just get tired of  the only fusion being alexandrite please take my idea into consideration   Full Review   
 It's not loading?? I downloaded the app, but it's not loading? I don't know, it just stays on a picture of the house with the stone lady but it doesn't load at all. I would rate higher if I could play and I'm very hyped to try to play but only if it works. I tried uninstalling and then downloading it again but nothing changed....what am I suppose to do?   Full Review   
 Not your usual shovelware Usually you'd be right to avoid cashcow series turning into terrible games and spin-offs, but this title is legitimately worth your time.  It is basically South Park: Stick of Truth, but with a Steven Universe plot, visuals, references, and even new stuff you'd expect to find within the show itself. Not only that, but it's fresh. It doesn't feel like rehashed material, but like an episode of its own. The characters have character, they're written as you would expect them to speak, and there is partial voicing of the dialogue in the most important places.  I have only played through the first world and a little into the second so far, and there has already been a decent amount of referencing to the show that could be considered spoilers. I'm not too sure where this game would be set timeline-wise, but it's definitely somewhat deep into season 1.   Give it a chance. I don't think you'll be disappointed if you love Steven Universe.   Full Review   
 Really Great for the Price I truly enjoy this game for not knowing much about the cartoon. This is how a RPG should be. It is sad there is nothing else like this. I would gladly pay more for a sequel out update. My only gripe is the level cap. I am on the third level and already maxed. I hope for a higher level cap, more skills, and maybe different fields in the future.   Full Review   
 Whats up with this! I love the show, and couldn't wait to get the game! When I enter the game is just shows the temple! I tried restarting my phone, and uninstalling and reinstalling the app, but no luck. Very disappointed. I want my three dollars back, and so do alot of other people.   Full Review   
 Amazing Can't stop playing, its so much fun the music is nice to listen to. The voice acting sounds great and the balance between its fun and difficulty is perfect.   Full Review   
 A Fun Way To Pass the Time Very simple and straight forward. A really fun game with just the right amount of difficulty for a mobile game.   Full Review   
 Fun but too many touch issues Some touch commands can't be used properly due to lag and or freezing ruining some battles.  It's happened so often I just quit playing now when it happens.  There's time it won't even start up, stuck at the intro screen because it refuses to register my touch and or swipe to start the game.  Unplayable IMO.   Full Review   
  This a perfect example of a well done mobile RPG, no cluttered controls, good use of touch and fun to boot.   Full Review   
 Great Game, but more potential This game is an average RPG with all the mechanics of one. The story, while it could have tried to be intergrated with the TV series, it's still good. I think they should have waited a little. By the time they realeased this, Steven was still pretty vanilla,compared him in the show now, and we still didn't get Sardonyx, and Pearl and Amythest's fusion wasn't used alot. It ends up being, the gems are pretty limited in terms of attacks, but the game is still good.   Full Review   
 Totally worth buying!! This game is really fun and addicting hahaha. I didn't even know that I was playing for 1 hour.   Full Review   
 New level Maybe the  next stage will have red,yellow and violet bosses and a new one like light blue ice penguin   Full Review   
 Amazing game! Okay, might be a bit biased since I love SU, but I love this game.  Simple artstyle and addicting.  What the gems say when you tap or heal is funny and in character. Voice acting is also on point.  Would recommend to anyone who likes SU!   Full Review   
 BEST GAME EVER! This is one of the best rpgs I've ever seen, so much quality and effort has been put into something very professional and lovable.   Full Review   
  I want to play this game but I seem to be among those who are having trouble with the game crashing/going blank at the very start.  What kinds of devices are others using that have the same problem??   Full Review   
 Very creative and addicting! An essential for any SU fan! If I had one complaint it would be that there's not much to do in the post-game. Once everyone's leveled up, and you've got 100% on everything, there's not much to do but restart.   Full Review   
 X10!!!!!!!!!! I love this game with a passion!  I've restarted it about 10 times now and collected every single item and badge. My first play through I, I bought every item from the Prism Statue.   Full Review   
  It's awesome just missing out on sugilite blast and Opal harmony strike hope they add it PLEASE and more levels or at least little quest but they should at least but lion at work!!!   Full Review   
 Amazing show, great game I'm glad they made a good game to go with a great show, all I could want from either is more! Hope a sequel gets made and hope the show stays around for a very very long time   Full Review   
 Steven Mario RPG It's very reminiscent of Super Mario RPG with timed attack/defense and such. Well balanced (slightly difficult), and I'm wagering at least 10+ hours content for 3 bucks. No in-app purchases. This is the best mobile RPG ever.   Full Review   
 It's good but It needs more bosses more fusions and more characters.Oh and add a secret final boss please!   Full Review   
 Wont work I am running on a sony tablet S, it is old but this game isnt working. I really want my 3$ back qq   Full Review   
 I want to change my phone I dont want to lose all my hours spent in this game i want to keep my levels where can i save data?! I dont care if i have to pay please help!!   Full Review   
 The download didn't work!!! I just downloaded this game and it won't run, it opens a background image but that's it! WTH!!!   Full Review   
 Reminds me of Mario and Luigi Any RPG fans will love this ! It has a very Mario and Luigi style timed attacked system. It's so good!   Full Review   
 Steven Universe This game is just so good i honestly would not mind paying for a longer sequel   Full Review   
 Awesome! But... Can there be a future update with Homeworld gems like Lapis, Jasper, and Peridot? They'd be great to see. Also, could there be a gemsona mode on here where you can do a story of your own? Like it'd be a full on RPG and you decide what you do in the story! That'd be AWESOME! Keep up the good work and I would love.to see more in the future!   Full Review   
 Super cool game Steven Universe 4EVER, the boss fights are really fun   Full Review

 The best Star Wars game, now on Android Everything you loved about the original KOTOR, with none of the glitches or emulation issues. Plays great on my Neo 5   Full Review   
  Game doesn't load, gives me a message saying download failed I may have not purchase this app, if you get this message uninstall and re-download   Full Review   
 Great so far! - Galaxy s6 Runs really well so far. At first i had the error where it said i haven't purchased the game. I uninstalled the game and re-downloaded it using my data (disconnected from wifi). Worked perfectly afterwards.   Full Review   
 Cloud saves? I just had to restore my phone for another reason but i redownloaded kotor to learn i lost hours of play. I thought this title had cluod based saves?   Full Review   
 Aahhh... the memories. If i remember the glitch, right b4 fighting malak, correctly; if this truly an exact replica, can't wait to check out the scene with my lightsaber pre-drawn.   Full Review   
 Its like it was designed for a phone Really really good to play on phone actually more enjoyable runs great on OnePlus one I'm highly addicted.   Full Review
