 Excellent. Plays perfect with playpad pro. Great game. Took long enough to get it on Android but it is nearly flawless. 35 hours in and not one crash. Only a couple of brief audio glitches. Thanks for achievements. KOTOR II please!!!   Full Review   
  I have been waiting forever to play this game again and after I upgraded my phone it pops up that I didnt pay for it   Full Review   
 Great Game But Needs 2 More Things This is a great game and everything I just wish that once u completed the Game u could still keep playing even after you kill Malik, also I think you guys should consider adding a Multiplayer, other than that the game performance and everything is great   Full Review   
 Ebon Hawk mini game Its almost impossible to defeat the enemy fighters in the ebon hawk...the controls are laggy and you cant shoot and move at the same time.  PC was better on this.   Full Review   
  Putting this in the front very important to me. Go to the company that made the games website and do the thing so they make the second game mobile also cuz i want to play it again.  Game works great for me once again happy they fixed it. Now Time to make the 2nd on mobile   Full Review   
  Knight of the Old Republic was one of the Star Wars best games ever to have played with. It works for every smartphone, iPad and tablet! Be careful of some glitch and you can adjust the settings on how to make the transition to look smoother!   Full Review   
  had a chance to be incredible,  but it has serious bugs that older versions had "I'm broken, so very very broken"   Full Review   
 Broken game I can't see anything after the first loading screen. It acts like I'm pressing buttons and I can hear the menu music for the character creation but I can't see anything.  If I hit back enough eventually the "are you sure you want to quit"  screen pops up but it doesn't show anything else on screen if I hit no   Full Review   
 Says "I don't own this app" I purchased this app, and proceeded to download all two gigabytes of data onto my phone, when at the very end after it is all installed, it claims that I cannot access the application because I do not own it. Someone please help because I have tried to download it onto two different devices and it just refuses to allow me at all to actually launch and play the app. I feel as if I just wasted the money   Full Review   
 Not loading Was a great game to play and had a blast, but since last update it tries to download files then stops and kicks me out saying I may not have purchased the game. If this is fixed it's an excellent game. But the fact I cannot open it now means it's a waste of money.   Full Review   
  You cannot run and shoot at the same time on a touch screen device.  There is no way to kill Marl in the duel ring because of this.  I now have to buy a $40 controller to play a $10 game.   Full Review   
  I have no clue why but none of the dialogue show's up when I'm taking to people. Not any of my dialogue options or what they're saying.   Full Review   
 Best Game Ever It's the best game I have ever played but 2 of my characters disappeared juhani disappeared after I re-entered dantooine and HK-47 right after I bought him and left the shop. I spent some time in the site school and I experienced a bug that made it where I couldn't talk to people and can't go to a different sector   Full Review   
 Insane Get this , u won't be dissapointed if you have played it before or never have.  A must for star wars lovers , so easy to operate as well   Full Review   
 I paid but it won't work Gives an error saying I may not have paid for the game. I clearly paid for it to charged to my T-Mobile bill. Then I downloaded it through my data connection which adds to my total data used. Fix it or give me my refund.   Full Review   
 BEST PORT This is the same identical game we all played 12 years ago on Xbox and PC. All the features/gameplay is present in this port. Nothings is scaled down. You are truly getting bang for your buck as the content in this game is MASSIVE! DONT CONSIDER THIS A MOBILE GAME, its a full fledged RPG with the content of skyrim or mass effect. Expect to do nothing but play this game for the next 80 hours.   Full Review   
 Says I didn't purchase, What a disappointment was really looking forward to this. I sent an email to their support over a week ago and I never got a reply. I read people having similar issues guess I'll just get a refund. It is a great game though..... ****** just thought I should retry downloading it worked can't wait for my phone to get charged so I can play thanks aspyr hope to see kotor 2 soon   Full Review   
 Best RPG Period Easily the best game you'll find on the app store, one of the best stories ever told and highly addictive. Worth every penny.   Full Review   
 Love the game, shame it doesnt run properly. Bought this game ages ago now and have it installed on my samsung s4 and it runs great. Shame its so small but its great. I had also tried to install it on my lenovo s6000 tablet and could do so but all the character models would be all white coloured and not load correctly which is really frustrating seeing as the game runs pretty well other than that. Would be great if this issue could be addressed because i think the menu size and controls of this really suit a 10 inch screen.   Full Review   
 Amazing thus far So far I love the game. -I've only just made it to the undercity of Taris, but plays well. I've had no instances of Lag whatsoever, and I have the graphics set as high as possible. I use a Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+. I really hope KOTOR II gets ported too.   Full Review   
 Good game but... It's a great rpg, but i feel that mobile controls aren't the best for it.   Full Review   
  Love what they did with the Android port of Star Wars: Kights of the Old Republic. Runs great and the controller support is a must. Great job!  However... there's this problem when I play on my Android tablet (Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5" SM-T800, resolution 2560x1600, Android 5.0.2). When the  "HIGH QUALITY GRAPHICS" option is enabled the entries text on the Quests menu is missing. On my smartphone (Samsung Galaxy S4 i9505) there is no such problem, everything is ok.  I hope this problem can be solved.   Full Review
title: Star Wars™: KOTOR

reviews:
I cannot open it Is this game doesnt compatible with zenfone 2 ze551 ml? Or not compatible with intel chipset? Cause I cannot open it, only black screen for me everytime I open it   Full Review   
 Amazing and addictive I really love this game, the only things that bothers me sometimes are, that the quest are somewhat repetitive (kill X number of enemies) and the difficulty skyrocketed towards the mid to endgame. This game feels like the devs really enjoyed making it with tons of easter eggs or references to other games. I also bought the DLC which in my opinion is not worth 2€, maybe 1€ but I bought it to support this amazing game.(it is good but maybe not worth 2€ in terms of the new content)   Full Review   
 Won't open On xperia z3, fond memories of this game and wanted to go back now it crashes on load up every time, please fix it   Full Review   
 Love it but... There is a glaring bug that makes some locations flicker like crazy and hurts to look at.  Update: 4/4/2016. Still having the flicker issue.   Full Review   
 6/5 stars! Great oldschool fun with something for every rpg fan.  Of course the graphics are not modernized but they are good enough to enjoy, as well as helping to set the tone.  The game really sucks you in and is well worth more than the asking price.  Great for 5 minutes, or long playthroughs if you are that lucky lol.  It is NOT pay 2 play/win for the game you buy and dlc is optional but worth it.  Easy to aquire all you need to beat entire game.  EDIT:  Devs need to fix problem with grindstones not spawning.   Full Review   
 A fantastic game with great support! Bought this game on a whim. Played it for an hour and found it immensely fun. Decided to buy some gold for it. Wonderfully cheap in game purchase, a whole $1.97. It failed and so I emailed support. The returned to me in about six hours with a code to give me the gold I bought. Quick, easy and fantastic! I definitely recommend and in game purchases are by no means required. I was just excited and eager to get started!   Full Review   
 Great mobile game with unforgivable bug I got a new phone, logged into the same Google account I used to play Kopp for about a year, and I can only start a new game.. Please let me know if the game does not save on the cloud and I should uninstall. Otherwise I would love to continue my year long adventure. Update: still haven't heard from paradox about this issue.   Full Review   
 Awesomely Original This game is a refreshing romp through a hilarious and original 8-bit Nirvana that is long overdue. If you like rewarding questing and nostalgic humor in an old-school RPG framework, this game is for you. Chiptunes abound and it runs smooth as silk. Not a memory sucking beast either, you'll be able to play for hours on a fresh battery. Love the Dungeon Master twist, and the game characters and NPC's pull it all together. Great game, worth every dime.   Full Review   
 An RPG'ers Dream A thoroughly fun & addictive turn based RPG that combines elements of Final Fantasy, Dungeons & Dragons, and old school 8-bit aesthetics. Boatloads of retro charm, appealing graphics, a wonderful in-game sense of humor, surprisingly low battery usage and tons of replay value are just icing on the cake. Whether you want to sit and play for 2 hours or pass 20 minutes in a waiting room this is a great time killer.   Full Review   
 Awesome A RPG based on people playing a RPG?!?! Yes haha Its a really good game, however one slight downside is how short the first quest, its not a major downside and now worth taking a star, just a pointer :)   Full Review   
 Great game but.... I love this game to bits , I've only played maybe 2 hours of it and have fallen in love with it. The only thing is , I've purchased 3/4 of the huge coin packs but they haven't gone through to the game. I've received a confirmation text from my phone provider saying that it has taken the money but I still haven't received the in game money. I am extremely disappointed in this as this is a great game that's worth five stars but I won't be giving those stars until this issue is resolved   Full Review   
 Addicting, but Suddenly said "Billing Error" bla bla. I bought this legally. Just wanna know why it said that. Response please? :)   Full Review   
 Good but requires internet now A recent patch to the game added Google play functionality, but if your internet connection or WiFi is off the game crashes every time Google play forces a connection.  Otherwise it is a good little game that will keep you occupied for a while.   Full Review   
 I own this on 2 platforms And in no way am I disappointed,  it's like an almost dnd party, but it's just you.   Full Review   
 Amazing game Best rpg on the Google play store. Fun enough to play multiple times. Overall an amazing game.   Full Review   
 Can't stop playing Addictively fun and easy to pick up play and put down. Whether I play for 5 minutes or 5 hours I feel satisfied and keep going back for more. The game has a nostalgic mix of old school rpg with new school strategy, great writing, and fun to play. Reminds me of playing D&D 5e with my friends.   Full Review   
 Really awesome game! I've purchased this game about a week ago and only started to play about a day ago. Instantly got hooked on it! Really glad as well that support on delays is quick to reply as the bug I got caught up in was resolved in less than a day. Really awesome game!   Full Review   
 Can' open it I've seen news about this game and they said it's a very good game so I'd like to try. But somehow in my ZenFone2 it's not working?   Full Review   
  Great game, just for some reason when I purchased the 10000 coins I didn't receive it, even though it charged me, can you help?   Full Review   
 Incredibly Fun! I had a blast playing through this game. It has a surprising amount of depth! I highly recommend this game,  especially if either RPGs and/or D&D are enjoyable to you!   Full Review   
 Itemss! Add more items or materials and a new enchanting systems such as gems ! And multiplayer version of this APP!   Full Review   
 Amazing for anyone familiar with Dungeons and Dragons. This RPG mimicking tabletop D&D brings comedy to side quests and meta-gaming. I seriously recommend this to anyone who likes fantasy and comedy.   Full Review   
 Fixed rotation I love this game. But is there a way to turn off its automatic screen rotation?   Full Review   
 Crashes on Asus Zenfone 2 Screen just goes black after the Paradox Interactive logo. Excited to play this game but unfortunately doesn't work on Asus Zenfone 2. Will increase my rating once this issue is fixed. Thank you and God bless.   Full Review   
 Things are missing I no longer have the option for the haunted falls expansion and in 500+ in-game days, there hasn't been a single grind stone mining deposit   Full Review   
 Will not load on Zenfone 2 Will not load past the first splash screen on my Zenfone 2. Would rate it 5 stars if I could at least play it. Love this game.   Full Review   
 AWESOME game, with a caveat I played the hell out of this gameon iOS, but there is a major Android bug where grindstones-- used to level up the blacksmith-- don't spawn in caves, which really wrecks the game economy. Still no patch in sight, and so I'm wary of investingtoo much time in this until that's fixed.   Full Review   
 Love the game However I bought some gold and havent received it yet. Been an hour   Full Review   
 BEST RPG GAME EVER, WORTH IT Really love the gameplay, so unique and cute. Also i love the pixel art. Kudos!   Full Review   
 Nodes How can I mine? Can't find any nodes in dungeons.. But I love it!   Full Review   
 Great game but.. Uhmmmm is there an option to stop the screen rotation? I'd like to play the game in portrait please   Full Review   
 Excellent! This is the RPG I was looking since a long time and finally I'm so glad to have found it. Really excellent! Bought the DLC and some gold also to show the awesome devs some support. Keep up the great work!   Full Review   
 was expecting something better too easy. little strategy.. little depth.. glad i dint buy the more expensive version   Full Review   
 Not working I love the game, played it on my phone a lot. However the game doesn't want to load on my Asus ZenPad 8, not sure why its doing that if there's a way to shed some light on this issue or if the devs see this comment, I don't want to rate low but I'm not sure what to rate with this issue other then that 5stars easy.   Full Review   
 Fix the Grindstones Grindstone no longer spawns naturally in the cave areas. Fix for 5 stars.   Full Review   
  Asus ZenFone2 ml551 - the game doesn't work   Full Review   
 Doesn't start on lenovo yoga tab 3 pro I just get the first logo screen, then the screen goes black and nothing.  Looks like it's not compatible with Intel chipsets   Full Review   
  I don't really get why people are hot on this game. Yeah, it's cute and retro, but the world is super small and there's no over-arching story to tell you what to do next. I had fun with it for a couple days, but now I wish I would've gotten a refund before the sheen wore off. Oh well.   Full Review   
 Can't work Hi it can't work on Asus zen fone 2, and apparently most of the Asus models. Hope you can fix it maybe? Would greatly appreciate :D.  I tried it on other phone,  Sony,  it works great and I've lost sleep playing it.  It's extremely addictive and awesome! :D. Really hope the developers can do Smth about it.  Thanks in advance! :D   Full Review   
 Addictive Really fun app. Bring in a new meta game of a cRPG.   Full Review
title: Knights of Pen & Paper +1

reviews:
No point Coming from someone who's beat this game: The character selection process is rediculous; So many choices but very few are even useful. You can learn all you want about the dungeons as you go along but never be able to use anything you know because items drop randomly and you can't store them anywhere so it doesn't matter how tactful you are; having the right tools is a roll of the dice. It's a glorified game of dice: No strategy involved. If you try to play smart, you're only going to be beat by chance.   Full Review   
 too difficult chars.keep getting hit by status effects and i have to waste every turn trying to heal. no way to retreat. are there any areas to grind in? what about full screen? im still going to keep trying,i just wish it were a little easier.   Full Review   
 Fine...5 stars...but... Fun dialogue...challenging...well put together. But inventory needs work...badly. Just drop less loot. Element system and monster system is not done well. Visually tricky and I hate min max my weapons to fight bosses. If on PC id give 6/10 but on Android still 5/5 compared to competition.   Full Review   
 〰〰〰🌟A MATAEUS REVIEW 🌟〰〰〰 Well, I'm astonished! What a great game! It's got an excellent learning curve with a great level of challenge, many achievements to unlock and fantastic gameplay. Good humourous writing is accompanied by fantastic graphics and great music, and the whole thing runs super smooth. A really, truly great mobile RPG game!   Full Review   
 Setbacks are too huge Played for hours on the first "level", got killed (due to a mistake with equipping the party) and back to square one. Do not know if I can be bothered putting in the effort again. I really cannot see how you are ever going to get near the even harder levels. Life is too short.   Full Review   
 Truely well done The game is a retro styled turn based rpg, beautifully done and brutal at times, but easy games are never fun, this game isn't hard by any means but it becomes slowly less forgiving as you progress, basicly a learning curve for those expecting a free ride to victory. Well worth its price.   Full Review   
 Awesome Multi TOTAL PARTY WIPES Hard as hell. Starting out you are able to pick from 6 random classes for 3 slots. you unlock a variety of quality and curiosity as you beat SPECIFIC dungeons or if you beat more than X dungeons before your guaranteed Total Party Wipe. Robust mechanics system makes for varied and interesting combat and other challenges, which can sometimes  aid or hinder in massive ways, which makes your initial choice of Class NPC selection even more important   Full Review   
 Fun But is there NO way to get back to town while in a dungeon??? My bag is full so it won't let me advance... but all I can do is trash items and lose them forever.   Full Review   
 Needs rotate lock The game itself looks great, but you don't seem to be able to prevent screen rotation even when the device has it switched off, makes if impossible to play when lying down, a small thing but irittating.   Full Review   
 I have a suggestion For every party death, give small bonuses to future parties.   Each grave could indicate the bonuses, such as 11% more INT for getting far with a mage group. It would add to replay value!   Full Review   
 Great game But i feel like its almost hard and more frustrating to fight my phone because of the automatic turning of the screen.  If i want to turn the screen i can turn on screen rotation. Fix? Maybe?   Full Review   
  Game stalled and failed to run even after re-installing. Contacted the support email address 3 weeks ago, no reply. May be very good but can't recommend as didn't work and support nonexistent.   Full Review   
 Enjoyable and well done Game is fun to play. Inexpensive and well done. I also enjoy that it plays landscape or portrait, one handed games are hard to find.   Full Review   
 Love it It's a little confusing in beginning but once you star playing more the game becomes amazing. Fully recommended   Full Review   
 Really fun game Took a tiny bit of time to understand the game, but since then, it's been pure fun. The design, game mechanics and writing is great.   Full Review   
 New go to app! Saw this on steam a little while back and wishlisted it there.  Glad I did because this is an AMAZING mobile game. It is very much suited to a grab and go style of game that I don't usually associate with pc. Seems very complete and full featured.  Easy learning curve and very rewarding.  Couldn't recommend any higher.   Full Review   
  Thia game is really fun, and it os challenging at times. Just be prepared with your items to prevent status effects and do more damage, and you will be fine! The only problem I have is that there is not a way to lock your screen.   Full Review   
 Very brutal old skool Doesnt forgive. Expects you not to suck. In order to advance, set up complementary parties (tank, heals,dps) and look for eq that grants inmmunities. Research the enemies in each dungeon and get resis to their element and use weapons, skills, & spells that they are weak against. First u survive one dungeon, then you start to buildxp and gear, then it is ez.   Full Review   
 Brilliant game! Yes it is difficult but why make it easy? Trying to get the perfect combination of characters to assist one another is enjoyable and challenging!   Full Review   
 Almost perfect Great game and refreshing that there are no micro transactions. I would have played double. My only complaint is that the rotation does not stick with the OS's setting. I love that it can be played landscape or portrait, but I wish there was a toggle to lock it in place. Lying in bed and trying to play is frustrating.   Full Review   
 Old school feel Love this game it takes me back to dos days playing on pc.   Full Review   
 Almost No way to grind, no way to go back town once in dungeon, punishing difficulty. Could have been great, notwithstanding the game doesn't play in full screen, but sadly too many downfalls.   Full Review   
 Fun, funny and challenging Lots of nerd references tied into the story. Tons of characters and party customizations that will keep you playing for hours.   Full Review   
 Great game. This game is great for short term or extended play. Best of all (unlike most games) they don't want access to your entire phone to play. A definite bonus.   Full Review   
 FREAKIN AMAZIN Keep up da good work.   Full Review   
  A lot of good things, like no iap bs and good sense of humor. The only thing annoys me is auto rotation. Please provide a landscape only mode and I'll rise my reading to 5-star.   Full Review   
 Amazing!!! I bought this game because the video was amazing, and the game is even better!!!   Full Review   
 Screen Can you make an option to lock the screen one way or the other its worth two stars!   Full Review   
 Stuck loading on asus zenfone2 Dont know why. After i choose the language and fit to screen it stays on loading :(   Full Review   
 Love it Honestly love it, keep up the good work   Full Review   
 Hudl 2 stuck on loading screen Bought this yesterday because I though it looked really good, installed, started and it's still loading apparently lol ^^  I have tried several times but always have the same result unfortunately.   Full Review   
  Very fun and classic style, funny dialogue. Just dont like how you cant turn around and that the whole game resets when you die.   Full Review   
 Coooooooooooooool(^v^) I'm play this game a long time and it's very good.   Full Review   
 Not working Still freezes at "loading" screen on my asus k00e.   Full Review   
 Great game Can be very challenging at times. Great time waster   Full Review   
 Very nice Strange until I grasped it, after which is magic. Update: I can't stop playing since 3 days, hope it doesn't ruin my life :)   Full Review   
 Best game in existance So worth it   Full Review   
  THE BEST GAME ON PLAY STORE!!!!   Full Review   
  Please patch so this game works on the ASUS Zenfone 2. This game looks fun, but it freezes at the loading screen after I choose what resolution I want to play in.   Full Review   
 I keep dying Fun, addicting, mobile rpg. Worth it.   Full Review
title: Pixel Heroes: Byte & Magic

reviews:
Upset I had this game on my phone and it broke so I waited for a few months to put it on my tablet and I lost the first dlc I paid for. I love this game and I'll continue to support you guys but just upset   Full Review   
  Can't restore purchases of DLC on my new phone. Guess I won't be coming back to this any time soon. A shame, too - it's lots of fun.   Full Review   
 Loved the game, but... There is no "New Game+" right now and after you have cleared the game 100% there is very little to do except trying out different classes/combinations with the same Story. 5 Stars if the devs add something to do after the quests and improve the crafting system a bit... UPDATE: 4 Stars again since my device finally recieved the update   Full Review   
 [SOLVED] Lost content Changed to five stars again due to developer solving my problem. Great app with great developers. 😊                                                                                                                                                              ***************************************** Old phone broke and when I downloaded the game on my new phone all saves and bought DLC's where gone. Same Google account and samsung account.   Full Review   
 Great Sequel Doesn't quite live up to the original for me, but still an amazingly addictive RPG-lite.  I've probably sunk a couple dozen hours into this game already, and the developer continues to release both free and paid content updates.   Full Review   
 This is better then kopp 1 For me i think this really better then kopp 1 story is better and funny and the battle system waaay better then kopp 1 i dont know why the download for kopp 1 is 100 thosen and kopp 2 is only 10 thosen....at this rate they will lose or the profit will not worth the time and money they spent making this game so this mean no kopp 3....guys dont listen to bad review please buy this game if you liked the first one...belive me more better then the first one...and i hope the dev will make kopp 3 i dont mind paying for lots of dlc if it mean getting kopp 3 and 4 and so on   Full Review   
 Problems Solved It took a while, but all the issues I had were fixed.  Fantastic game.   Full Review   
  Read alot of bad reviews, so didn't get it. That was a mistake. For anyone who played d&d back in the eighties, this is priceless. The very first monster is the freaking tarasque! I about died. I also remember playing with people who had 100+ level demi-gods, 25 all stats, & weapons from dieties & demigods like thors hammer. It's like cmon, really? There's just no way! Love it, please keep content coming!   Full Review   
 A skeleton of a game, now with DLC! After several freaking months of no updates, they finally release one. Too bad it's DLC, and it's and at mid level players. Also there are still no charms. Why did the previous developers have to give up Knights of pen and paper to these numbskulls?   Full Review   
 Fun Retro RPG Never played the original, but the artwork in this one seems much better. The quests are good and often amusing, the story may be a little short but the gameplay makes up for it. With free a free content update and a couple of DLC there is no longer an issue with it being too short.   Full Review   
 DLCs When I said 'add more content', I didn't ment you need to pay for extra stuff in the game, really disappointed in a game I loved before   Full Review   
 Was upset, but after updates VERY satisfied When game first came out I played it and was really disappointed, but after trying it again after the latest update I love it. .   Full Review   
 Need More Content New game + please   Full Review   
 Great mobile rpg It is fantastic and we'll with the money the expansions are big and worthwhile while still not necessary in order to have a good time and you can dump endless hours into finding the perfect party!   Full Review   
 Has matured into a nice game Still not quite the same value as the first game, but it's a wonderful game nonetheless   Full Review   
 Great fun + depth Builds on the first game but much deeper rules.  Somehow also very intuitive and simple for noobs.  Great time killer   Full Review   
 Bug in gold option The 5 dollar gold option gives only 1500 gold as compared to 10000 from the cheaper option. Feel kinda gypped   Full Review   
 Fatal Error on boot java.lang.error: signal 11                  was working fine before update   Full Review   
 LOVE THIS GAME....?;));/;/!!! Knight Of Pen And Paper 2 is the best RPG game...!!!!!!   Full Review   
  Good continuation of the series, classes have more in-depth synergies. Enjoyed the improved character creation and the new mechanics around the three dice stats.   Full Review   
 Great Omg this  game is fantastic   Full Review   
 Crashes Otherwise, awesome game.   Full Review   
 Disappointing followup The original Knights was likely the best mobile game I've played, but this is substantially worse. There's less to do, a world that feels less alive, less characters, less classes, and less story, even with all the DLC. Not to mention the port to Android is sloppy at best. Any time you quit and resume it ends up with a conflicting save that you have to pick one of, and then gives you 1k coins. Every time you start the game. It's lazy at best. Passable if you liked the first &  want a time waster but no more   Full Review   
 Very poor support I thought this game would be great, and it was, until I couldn't use the weapon enhancement crafting system. I sent an email request to Paradox and had a response from someone who said he didn't know much about the game and that I must not know what I'm doing. I sent back screenshots as evidence and his response was that I must not have those recipes. However, he did not have a clue where to find those recipes. Not to be found, supposed to be there from the beginning. Very disappointed in Paradox.   Full Review   
 Meh Pretty obvious they've decided, rather than charge the right price up front, to scalp as much money as they can, bit by bit, out of you. The "main" game is very bland and quick to complete, most missions lack any real originality or humour like the original game, the expansion pack was even shorter and felt like a cash in, and to make it worse despite my account being linked it still wiped everything after I bought/earned most of the upgrades. Not very impressed. Shame as looked forward to it.   Full Review   
 Enjoyable Loved it. It had great diversity, a small world and the quests were a bit annoying with travelling across the realm and back for almost every mission. My only request is a bigger world and some sub-quests. Btw the music was awesome!   Full Review   
 Changed KoPaP1 for all the worse Let me say I loved KoPaP1. But all these mechanic changes in 2 are seriously pissing me off. Conditions are much weaker and more unreliable due to the resist system. Gold income is L O W and makes the game feel like a grind, struggling to get money. Respec costing that much is a joke, how am I supposed to experiment with my builds / characters like that?! I cannot recommend this game, having played the 1st one. Such a letdown.   Full Review   
 Not bad followup but not enough content for $ I loved the first one. This one pretty good but u blow through initial content really quickly and have to put up more $ for DLC which would b OK but u also get through that quickly.  I found crafting worthless. Would never let me enchant weapons which I never figured out. Needs more DLC and I'll pick it back up but I've seen no signs of this happening.   Full Review   
 Great. Minus replay This game is great. It has a dungeon and dragons vibe with the dice rolling and being told by a dungeon master at the table. Very awesome; however once you've beaten the game and finished the quests there is nothing to do besides start a new game with the classes you've unlocked. A new game + system or even some kind of end game dungeon with some truly spectacular loot would be fun.   But once you beat the game there's not much to do in terms of replaying it. Now I wouldn't give the game lower than a 4 ever   Full Review   
 Can't update to newest version Whenever I go to update, the download bar will fill up, but then it will start downloading again.  After 4 times of this, it gives up.  I love this game, please help me.   Full Review   
 Would love more content! Great game, wish there was more frequent dlc. But with the quality of the add on content I can see why it is spread out.   Full Review   
 I disliked it The firs one was a lot better and more fun than this.   Full Review   
 Long awaited sequel Thank you devs! I have been waiting for this for so long. Just the first character creation page had me orgasmic squeal. You will not know how to live a life till you have played this.   Full Review   
 Its original Have played this before the dlc and cleared the game was quite good. Be reinstalled it seeing as there is more content only to find out my game has been deleted and even though I've paid for the game I now have to pay again to unlock more story and characters.   Full Review   
 ---~~~* A Mataeus Review *~~~--- I loved the first game. I still do! I play it on and off even after owning it for years, and am yet to try everything. First impressions of the sequel are great - improved aesthetics, lovely animated icons and excellent playability. Then... It's over. And you buy DLC. Then THAT'S over. The original with +1 is awesome. This is not.   Full Review   
 Great old school RPG Very tongue in cheek, cool art work. I love this game.   Full Review   
 Awesome If you've ever played PnP games, you'll find a connection to this game. Lots of fun to play and read.   Full Review   
 Can't play don't buy it The game crashes randomly after a few minutes of gameplay. Don't buy this game.   Full Review   
 Well worth it. A sequel to one of my favorite mobile games. Great rpg with humor throughout.   Full Review   
  End-game campaign fixed :)   Full Review
title: Knights of Pen & Paper 2

reviews:
Game Progression Halted by Bug Spoilers! In chapter 4, Mell will not break the magic barrier on one of the hills. I can't progress past this point and the bug happens even when I reload the game.   Full Review   
 Won't download Looks like a cool game but I've been trying all day to download the game via wifi and it always times out and will not download. Need to figure out how to get a refund   Full Review   
 slapdaqular all over if this game dosnt work on ur phone its not the game its your junk phone with no hdd at all buy a better phone go get a moga pro and play this game   Full Review   
 Bard's Tale Can not save my game without it becoming corrupted. I really liked the game on the original Nintendo. I was hoping to get an updated version for my tablet.   Full Review   
 In-app purchases suck I bought talents for 1.99. The save game that I was told had my purchase never came, and you still took my money. Either you send me my purchase post-haste, or I demand a refund. UPDATE: Now the damn game won't save even on an excellent wifi connection. Get your act together, I'd hate to think i wasted money on an otherwise great game.   Full Review   
 Fun but has software bug issues...? During game play conversation text suddenly not showing and no voice during conversation with a character.   New players , after first down load of 28MB you will need up to have free storage of 3.7GB for the HD download profile or choose low resolution version download which will take approximately 40% less storage space to download the game. Have fun!   Full Review   
 Don't bother playing, your saved games will be lost This game is great... until you loose all your progress. Played for nearly 10 hours, trusting the in-game save system (and the Google play backup), and one week, i played without net connection. When I connected back, my actual save was overwritten with the old google play one, making me loose one week of play. Other comments complain about adequate save system / corrupt saved files as well. Don't bother playing, you'll loose your time. I mean, how difficult is it to create a reliable save system ???   Full Review   
 Update? I don't think that means what you think it means. I really got addicted to this game and everything was working great but then I updated and its been one problem after the other. My save got corrupted the game started glitching out and now my moga controller doesn't work.   Full Review   
 It's fun with a good story line. My only complaint is that I bought the bow, but I cant use it yet. Make sure you're nice to the dog and train him to fight.   Full Review   
 Issue Game works great on my galaxy s5. But I'm having issues in highland park. MELL isn't opening one of the final barriers. Any clue? It's an issue that isn't letting me move forward. I'd like to give it more stars, and verifying install didn't fix it   Full Review   
 Very Funsy. Nice graphics.  Low price. Small bugs in thr game but nothing too serious so far. Lest nothing that makes me want to stop playing.   Full Review   
 FUN! Brought from 5 stars to 1. Great game as long as the save works. Corrupts within the first hour and can't load.  This has apparently been an issue since MAY and no comments from the devs or a fix.  Cannot recommend to anyone until fixed.  Very sad as it really is a fun game.  Get your act together please and fix the save issue!   Full Review   
 Works great on an HTC sv one. Gameplays smooth having a bit of trouble and I'd like to move my controls around but it works amazing and plays just as good if not smoother than on the console. Sodas   Full Review   
 Great game, only ONE problem... SO the game is great.   Just one thing,  don't expect your in-app purchases to transfer when you get a new phone. Also, don't expect tech support to get back to you regarding this,  I spent about 20$ and everything is just gone and I haven't received a response to my 3 seperate inquiries. So, besides that, it's awesome. That's the reason for 4 out of 5 stars.   Full Review   
 Awesome Funny, great graphics and so epic. A must for rpg fans everywhere! Had to drop some stars. Cannot complete it due to save games becoming corrupt... Bit aggravating.   Full Review   
 Why not? I was skeptical about controls on a mobile (I have a Z3), but actually it works better than most games I've played. I played this game briefly oh so many years ago on PC and I don't regret buying it for mobile. It does drain battery a little and I opted for the larger installation because, you know, PIXELS; but I don't regret getting this game. It's entertaining, absorbing and the port has retained the spirit of the original with the optional purchases not interfeering in anyway. For this price, why not?   Full Review   
  Great game. Very funny and plays well on the hudl 2 (hi def). Only problem so far is that every time I go back into the game... It claims my save games are damaged. Only way round this is to force a stop on the game via android settings / apps and then go back into the game. A bit disconcerting! Looks like a fair few people are complaining about this. Any chance the devs can sort this in a patch??? If this was fixed, it would be a 5star game.   Full Review   
 Great game but with buggy save This game deserves 5 stars if only game save wasnt buggy.  I lost 5 hours of offline gameplay when i went online again.  Seems that the game OVERODE my local save with the last save from google drive which was 5 game hours old.  What a waste!! :(  Was having so much fun too! Uninstalling...maybe ill pick it up again in the future but too disheartened to continue.  For others, my advice is to always play while connected to wifi....dont trust offline play until devs fix save bug.   Full Review   
 Serious waste of money I had bought in game items and halfway through the game all my saves started to become corrupted. Serious problem with the game other than that it is fun. Probably not going to play it anymore because I was so far and now I'm back at the beginning with none of my purchased items.   Full Review   
 Space It takes up too much space...... Can't down load the extras to the game because its too large, so I can't play.... Why don't you guys say how much space the game takes before its purchased   Full Review   
 Funny and fun Great game so far, loving the humour and the combat seems just right for mobile. Hoping at some point I can get a +5 greatsword or the like...   Full Review   
 Loved the xbox game... ... But this corrupted the moment I saved, and has crashed every time I've opened it since. Need a refund. Very disappointing.   Full Review   
 I played it on ps2 and this is even more bang for your buck now. The game now includes the msdos original trilogy and gives you options between a standard definition 1.5 gb download or a high definition (equal to the ps2 version) 3.5 gb download. The comedy is entertaining for rpg veterans and potty humored middle schoolers alike. There are different styles of skills to play through with and some different story twists depending on either snarky or pleasent dialog choices. Micro transactions are tucked away in the menus and non-intrusive/necessary.   Full Review   
  Working great except for the fact that my saved games are constantly becoming damaged somehow.  This is super frustrating.  Played for eight plus hours for nothing.  I like this game a bunch but whats the point if i cant save reliably.  Please fix this.   Full Review   
  Snarky Cary Elwes written and performed, accented dialogue, and an action RPG format to design your own party! Hack n slash, parody send up done right, and running brilliantly in HD on my droid turbo.   Full Review   
 Samsung galaxy s4 I love this game and even after I lost my in app purchase the developers REPLYED back and have EVEN gave me my bard topped up back thank you very much n i hope you make part two to it i will recommend this game with customer support aswell not many DO REPLY BACK BUT THESE DEVELOPERS DO AND HELP YOU AND AM VERY GRATEFUL FOR THAT   Full Review   
  This game is awesome but... I had a problem. The butcher got killed and I could not progress AT ALL. I also spent money on the game. Lost it all. Had to start over from the beginning of tower 2 . five and a half hours of game play just gone. Did not say anything at first and would have given the game like a 10 star but I guess crap happens to paying customers.   Full Review   
 Fun, best phone game yet? Although no crashes, a few bugs that needed a complete phone reboot.   Full Review   
  I have spent 6 dollars on this game and the file keeps on getting corrupted . so I think I should get reimbursed or someone should make think right   Full Review   
 Bards tale Great,great,great,lots of fun,love the songs. Lord bless Charlie hops the man who invented beer.   Full Review   
  Pretty fun little RPG, the controls could be a little better however, all in all I say it's worth it. It's a nice bonus to include the original trilogy.   Full Review   
 Hilarious! (Samsung tab 4) Cracks me up every step of the way. Loads of fun. Game play is like Diablo but simpler. It's a must have game! Only complaint is that sometimes I have to exit and close and restart to resolve some bugginess. My save wouldn't load just now and yesterday that dude wouldn't open those electrified walls so I could continue. But I noticed a reboot cures all that so far. I test loading after I save now. Still I'm all about the bards quest and I gotta give it all the stars just from what I've seen it was worth it!   Full Review   
 Update messed up multi fire Update today 4/18/15 and on 2/17/15 were not adreesed. Try to battle with a bow, it exposes you to no movement on LG Vista. You can fire but all movement or legends disappear after a double tap.(The newest update when trying to multi fire arrows by tapping now enlarges the screen and cannot move.  On LG Vista 12A. Please fix love the game 5 stars back when you do. Loved this from the original to now. Played them all from the begining!)   Full Review   
 Perfect! A definite must-have gaming app. Why can't there be more games like this one out there?....update: wanted a great game to play, so 2 years later, on my new s6, the bards tale is STILL awesome!!  Also, i am having no issues with my saves becoming corrupted. Game is working smoothly, as expected.   Full Review   
 Very silly tongue in cheek ARPG. One of the better mobile games I have across. Then again it is a port to mobile so it should be half way decent anyway, right? Found only one fairly low cost and pointless in app purchase. That was for all the artwork, silly songs and in game movies. All unlockable via gameplay anyway so no problem   Full Review   
 One problem The game is absolutely brilliant, funny and very addictive but it seems the problem with the saved files getting corrupted has still not been fully fixed since I just lost over 8 hours of gameplay as well and whereas I can pick up the part I was in quite easily by just skipping the dialogues and doing everything as fast as I can, it is still frustrating because nothing seems to work for me and let me keep my saves. Please fix it! Other than that, as a game, full 5 stars.   Full Review   
 Decent fun Lots of jokes, too frustrating at times with the difficulty. It's like the game can't decide if it wants to be silly and fun, or unreasonably challenging. Too many times I just hit a wall and have to try it 100 times before I randomly win the fight. Funny dialogue.   Full Review   
 Old School RPG, Has Major Issue. It seems to be a good port. Difficult, yes, but still enjoyable. The only problem is my save will not load. It says the chapter progress is damaged, and should be deleted. I am a good few hours through, and I do not want to start a new save. Does anybody know how I can fix this? It's been a few months since I have been able to play. If the developers can fix this, I'd gladly give it 5 stars.   Full Review   
 Great game, but it's too buggy! Ever since I started playing, I kept having issues where sometimes cutscenes would not advance. There's a part in the game where a character won't move and you need to quit and reload several times just so you can keep going. I haven't had the cutscene problem anymore, but now, I frequently get told that a save file is damaged and it won't load! And this time, quitting the game won't fix it. Seems like I'll lose all my progress. Fix this, devs, please!   Full Review   
 Unplayable Wanted to play original series but when ever you have to go to the keyboard it doesn't work. Unable to create new character, type in spell short cut, or use arrow directions. Highly disappointed.   Full Review
title: The Bard's Tale

reviews:
Amazing My 2nd favorite storyline in a Dragon Quest game. 7 was the best(my opinion) by faaaaar. DQ 5 is a great game, hate the controls, rather play it on the DS. Still I purchase it in hopes SE would make some console games in the US.   Full Review   
 Excellent Port I never played the original DQ5 but I always heard it was the best in the series. And I'm actually loving it so far. The music is astounding and although the controls takes some getting used to, I think people looking for a solid JRPG on Android should look no further. Look past the $15- you're getting a worthy game for that price. I do wish the game was overhauled to fit mobile and 'save' anywhere was implemented. Quick Save is such an archaic feature.   Full Review   
 Finally, DQV! Like the FF series, I have been a big fan of DQ. I have played all the DQ, and have been a huge fan of the story of DQV and have been waiting for this to come to Android! Like DQIV, the controls will take a bit of getting used to, but the game itself is just like I remember, except for the updated dialogue and character names. I personally don't like the changes since I hold the Japanese version close to heart. Regardless, I still give it 5 stars, great game, story, fun! DS version, choose from 3 girls! =D   Full Review   
 Beyond excellent! Easily one of the best video games of all time. Not only is the story first rate, the turn based battle system crushes the pointless ATBs and action elements of other RPGs. Final Fantasy 6 wishes it was half the quality of game that Dragon Quest 5 is. $15 is a steal for this masterpiece.   Full Review   
 An excellent traditional JRPG Dragon Quest V is about as pure as JRPGs come. You follow the adventures of a young boy as he grows into an adult. Battles are turn based and challenging. They feel a little unfair sometimes, but never unbeatable. There is a lot of grinding. Expect to fight many battles to earn the levels and money needed to face the challenges at hand. There is a monster capturing element that also takes time. The graphics are nice yet pixelated, and the controls are unwieldy but functional. Highly recommended!   Full Review   
 No quick save makes it a real DQ This is my first RPG game ever back on its first release on SFC in early 90s.  This certainly brings back lot of memories.  I dont know if I should be complaining the fact it doesn't have quick save function like all the other remakes in its series.  As this makes DQ5 much more harder to play just like the original one, but also means I have to keep the game running in the  background if I'm not next to a church to safe my process.  Nevertheless, it's definitely a 5/5!   Full Review   
 Early consisten crash Right after the beginner dungeon, I go home and sleep, wake up and the game freezes up on my lg g4.  Every. Single. Time. The control pad disappears and I'm left staring stupidly at the screen.  This is completely unplayable.   Full Review   
 Good story, bad RNG monster recruitment DQ5 has a great story but lack original characters like DQ4. Except Deborah, all characters are bland. DQ5 features monsters recruitment which sounds great at first but it is poorly executed due to too much RNG. Some monsters are really hard too recruit (healers especially...  Only monster get Omniheal...  3% chance and less to recruit)  and you can easily spend hours and days fighting the same monster and might never get it which brings a lot of frustration and no fun.   Full Review   
 Don't let controls complains deter you First let me say this is my first dragon quest rpg to date and while I have yet to finish It, I feel bad for missing out all these years.  Admittedly the controls are a little shaky, especially at first, as it can be a little difficult making a precise turn into a stairway sometimes.  However the benefits of having a clean interface that obscures so little of what is even in this age a very beautifully designed and animated game far outweigh the occasional directional hiccup.  Definitely a must buy!   Full Review   
 You did it again. Why? My arthritis makes it extremely difficult to play a game of this complexity without a stylus. You obviously can make a game compatible with my S-pen. DQ1, DQ2, DQ3, FF1, FF5, FF6...all are compatible with the S-pen. DQ4,  DQ5, and DQ8 are not. I see the pattern now, though. Thanks to your short - sightedness,  I won't even bother with DQ6. Thanks, SE. It was a good run while it lasted. I guess I will just have to stick with Final Fantasy and blow off Dragon Quest.   Full Review   
 Good times Dragon quest V probably my favourite among them. Though I prefer the old dejap translation from the snes version. Like all the phone rpgs I've played I find the controls finicky the dpad deciding to go down when hitting up.   Full Review   
 Autosave is garbage While the game is great the autosave is not.  Answer a phone call and you could lose more than an hour of gameplay because it won't auto save in a dungeon. Happened to me 3 times already (and once after recruiting a rare monster).   Full Review   
 EPIC I so love this game. DQ V is among my favorite in the series. I can't wait for VI. I like how like with DS they gave you Deborah to choose. She is by far my favorite bride   Full Review   
 Another hit Just have to ask. Once you get back to Dragon quest 8, will you make 9 and 10? Thats how many there are right? 10 Dragon quests?   Full Review   
  Please fix the game cause when it updates everytime my profile is deleted . I didnt buy this game for it to delete on me. It will be five stars if you fix this. This is for  a sony xperia M2   Full Review   
 สาวก Dragon Quest สาวก DQ V ต้องโดนใจแน่นอน ว่าแต่ น่าจะทำให้มันเปลี่ยนภาษาได้ด้วยนะ น่าจะดีมาก  แบบเลือก อังกฤษ ญี่ปุ่น ไทย(ถ้ามีจะน้ำตาไหลเลย)  [love this, but select language (English, Japan, Thai Support )].~* LOVE DQ /   Sad, my device  can't play this game. please help me (SAMSUNG GALAXY TAB S2 9.7) display scale - 4:3   Full Review   
 It's not as good as it could be. The controls are at best, terrible. The game also only allows for portrait mode, why can't SE allow landscape mode as well? Limited, half-assed port. Would be better to buy a NDS & this game.   Full Review   
 Awesome A flawless port of the DS version, with some added touches to the GUI and optimised for Android devices, it runs incredibly smooth, the controls are a little weird at first, but after a few minutes you get used to it and it feels natural, keep up the good work.   Full Review   
 Just a little feedback... The game is great as it is now, but I would like to se some little tweaks to the battle interface, at least to the characters' portraits.   Full Review   
 Never played the original DQ5 I just got to the second generation and its a good challenge. Requires some grinding but not too excessive (not yet anyways) I like the story so far.   Full Review   
 Great Game It's good. Can't really say much negative things about this game, besides the grindy nature,  but that's a flaw of the series in general   Full Review   
 Great game! It's really a shame that the Dragon Warrior/Quest games are not more popular in North America becuase they really are great games. Been playing them sence the 80s and this is my first time playing 5. It's plays well and so far the story is really good. It really goes to show that smart phones can be good for legitimate gameing and not just crappy micro transaction games. This is a real rpg ment to be a fun rpg. I am very much so looking forward to dq7 hitting the app store as the origonal was my favorite.   Full Review   
  FIVE STARS!!!  I put 1 to get attention.  I REALLY want DQ VII for 3DS, but if SE only releases it for mobile I will still buy it.  #DRAGONQUESTFORTHEWEST !!!   Full Review   
  Great game, also for those who are unaware, there is a quiksave function just open the menu, and for the controls you don't exactly have to use the d-pad, touch and drag from anywhere on the screen and it still works. STOP WHINING... love the series lol   Full Review   
 Thank you! Never had the chance to beat 5 & 6.  Excellent ports, THANK YOU!  - Droid Turbo.   Full Review   
 Please add Quick save everywhere Love the game. Please add the ability to quick save anywhere. It's a mobile game and I don't want to have to search for a save point to stop playing.   Full Review   
 Galaxy S3 Only played an hour of it so far and I like it except I feel the control pad is too sensitive   Full Review   
  Runs smooth, no crashes yet.  Switching apps, this one is always right where I left it.  Amazing game, and a solid implementation on Android.  Well done!   Full Review   
  Would be awesome if portrait mode and controller input was coded in.  Would love to play this on Nvidia shield handheld or TV.   Full Review   
 Every little interruption causes loss of progress Everything, every phone call, text, and alert that you check or answer and you lose all your progress going back to your last auto save this is absolutely game breaking. Didn't notice untill it was too late now I can't get my money back.... thanks alot... add a quick save function and this game would be a 5/5.   Full Review   
 Great Game, but Android port still needs lots of work I was thoroughly enjoying this game, until I got to the "ten years later". At which point, the game simply ceased to work. It will come up, allow me to load my status, then freeze when I start to explore. And it never freezes in the same spot twice. $10 wasted.   Full Review   
 Omg! This is the best dragon quest game ever! Thank you very much SE!   Full Review   
 Love it but. Please make dragon quest  1 and 2 available for the note 4   Full Review   
 Best game! Works well on my LG android phone, the game is worth playing but the controls take a while to get used to.   Full Review   
 Awesome! It's great to see these games coming to mobile. Especially not free to play. Full game 1 time fee just like it should be.   Full Review   
 Great story My favorite storyline in the series.   Glad to have it on mobile finally.   Full Review   
 A classic finally portable Yes I know this is on Nintendo DS but what I really like about this version is that it has cloud backup capabilities. Now I don't have to worry about loosing my DS with dq5 in the cartridge slot and permanently losing my progress. The only down fall to this game is that its too big for my 4gb HTC Desire so I have to play it on my very heavy tablet. It gets tiring having to constantly hold my tablet when I'm playing this game. It'd be nice if an update were released that gave the game auto screen rotate capabilities so I could use my tablet's kickstand and rest it on my chest when I'm playing.   Full Review   
 Autosave... Isn't reliable. It isn't mean closing the game at all. It's still in my active tasks but I just lost a hour or so of grinding. That's infuriating. Please fix squarenex the game deserves better than that.  It happens after 10 minutes or so of being put in background processes. Squareenix I know youve been unreliable with supporting your games. Please don't suck this time.   Full Review   
 Great game,  great price Easy controls and never freezes or crashes. Same $$$ as used game store.   Full Review   
 Best game ever I would give this a 1000000000000000000000000000000000000 stars if I could This is officially my favourite game in the universe if there was a remake on the Nintendo nx this year I would pay the full price as long as I could transfer my game data from this version   Full Review
title: DRAGON QUEST V

reviews:
Please do this Imagine if prodigal isn't dead she just got taken to versus. That would be the best plot twist ever!   Full Review   
 Worth the money At first, I wasn't really into the story. The beginning didn't grab my attention and the culture felt like it could be presented better. That being said, the story really grew on me and I felt the culture was present MUCH better later on in the story. I enjoyed the characters and I can tell...this can become a very large series. Well done 👏.   Full Review   
 Boring, do not buy. The story refuses to progress as if it's dragging it's feet. Every chance to move forward is replaced by needless descriptions.  I love COG stories but I wouldn't recommend this one. It's a shame I paid first to find out I didn't like it. At all.   Full Review   
 Where to Begin... It feels like you're stuck in a constant prologue. Not to mention that the narrative seems to punish you if you don't agree with the "preferred" path designated by the author. The two characters open for a romance are, quite honestly, appalling to me on a moral standpoint. Wait for the next one...and check its reviews on the choice of games website and forum.   Full Review   
 Great Love the descriptions and choice of action. One of the best choice of games i have ever played. Love intergalactic games and things that reference real life societal situations.   Full Review   
 WOW I have played many choice of games before. But man!! This blows them all away. I cannot WAIT for the next one. I never wanted it to end!   Full Review   
 The best one yet This is by far the best works I've read by you guys so far. Longest book I have read from you guys so far and very interesting. Absolutely willing to wait as long as it takes for the next part to arrive. Well done guys I'm totally impressed with this book.   Full Review   
 Just read it! No seriously! I enjoyed reading this book soooo much. If you're thinking about getting it, just do it!   Full Review   
  Really loved the first book can't wait to see the next the characters are all  so individual with their own goals and desires it's great getting to know them seeing how different they all are and the story is so well written I can visualize how it all looks and feal to be on planet versus.   Full Review   
  I love the heck out of this, sure sometimes there's a bit of a stumble and I need to reread to understand, but its worth the money   Full Review   
 Amazing I love this one so much the story and the decisions you can make plus the powers you can get just amazing!   Full Review   
 Details I really enjoyed the depth of this read.  Hoping the new book comes out soon. Thanks for putting so much work into this, it shines through in the experience.   Full Review   
 Great story I am definately going to reread to unlock all the acheivements.   Full Review   
 Can't wait for the next one! I got done reading the Hero's Rise trilogy and needed another great choice of games novel. Versus is just what I needed. I love the story and the stats pages. This game has a great story and your choices build up your character as if it's and rpg. Lots of choices and romance options and achievements are huge plusses for me. My only complaint would be that this is a 123k word novel when I'm used to 200-250k word novels for the same price. Wish this was longer and hoping the next one is. Still, 5 stars!!!   Full Review   
 Can't wait for the sequel Loved this book, although there are a lot of spelling mistakes,  which can be off putting.   Full Review   
 Liars Game is priced at $4. I buy the game for $4. Twenty minutes in the game is trying to get me to pay another dollar to "unlock" another feature.   Full Review   
 Omg I loved all of it. The relationships, stats, and how it made me feel.   Full Review   
 Fantastic One of the most in-depth stories by far!   Full Review   
 Versus delivers Great story, great system to keep track of powers, can't wait for the next one!   Full Review   
 Awesome Style I love the world and the characters, really well written and cant wait for it to continue   Full Review   
  I enjoyed this one a lot. This solves the issue of hero projects "give all characters some lines even if they are just sidekicks". Making the pacing way better   Full Review   
 Ready for more Can't wait for the next one   Full Review   
 Just amazing! It is written very well and is very creative. I hope there is a sequel in the future   Full Review   
 More Please continue this! I want more!   Full Review   
  When is the next one comng out T.T   Full Review   
 Again  really??? paid for the game only to have parts locked behind  micro  transactions.   Full Review   
 Please make more The story is awesome and I'm going to have to wait for the second part, but I hope that you make the next part pretty soon=)   Full Review   
 loved it! can't wait for more.   Full Review   
 Sequal please Love playing this over and over another please   Full Review   
  Great story with lot's of hard decisions   Full Review   
  Great game great descriptions enjoyable replay value but when is the second part coming out?   Full Review   
 Face paced excellence rge story has a great gast pace that kept me hooked   Full Review   
 Great It was well worth the play through. Cant wait for the next one.   Full Review   
 Omg!!!!! Best one I ever!!!! I need more!!!! Please get part 2!!!!!!   Full Review   
  Amazing. Enough said.   Full Review   
 Epic Full of mystery and wonder   Full Review   
  I like it   Full Review   
 Loved it just as much as hero rise. Do you have an estimated time for the next book. I really want to continue with the story :D   Full Review

title: VERSUS: The Lost Ones

reviews:
Great game, but... Only opens if you have an internet connection  which somewhat defeats the purpose of a mobile game.   Full Review   
 Good game, bad world movement I'll start off by saying I've played this game ALOT at different points in my life, so it is a great game for sure. If you have the option to, I'd say play it on snes, gba, or emulation of one of those. The movement is so stiff and I'm not sure I'll fully get used to it. The movement pad will 'stick' on screen for a few seconds after you let go while trying to adjust, so it is very anti user friendly. I played ff3, ff4, and ff5 without any qualms about their movement system, so not sure why they changed ff6   Full Review   
 Not connecting grrr Just keeps coming up Connection lost and can't open  I payed good money for this and it should work flawlessly  and should be able to pay with out Internet connection    FIX THIS NOW  😠   Full Review   
 The Touch Screen D-Pad Sucks!!! The on-screen D-Pad is just horrible and its pointless to try and play while I'm out and about. Good thing it has bluetooth controller support or I would have wasted my money.   Full Review   
 Great game Just one issue ,i have a problem start up wise ..like why do i have to have a network connection for the game just to start up it should be able to start up offline without the need for a connection please fix this ,as for the rest of the game its great brings me back to super nes days and then foward to todays technology ,a very good looking game   Full Review   
 My God I Love This Game! My favorite game of all time! Used to have to rely on emulators to play on the go, but this new version is fantastic so far. No issues whatsoever, I'm loving everything about it. Clouds saves are great. Kind of bothered by the need for a connection to play, how can I kill time in the woods if the game won't initiate? (2013 Moto X, Fire Phone CM11)   Full Review   
 Controls are bad Not very far into the game yet but it doesn't take long to notice how bad the controls are. I have been playing FFV and the controls are amazing. Then to come to this its a real shock. Besides the controls it looks great. Fix the controls and I'd give 5 stars.   Full Review   
 A good remake The classic is reborn with new and updated character models and updates backgrounds.  I am not that far in yet but so far the game is fun and enjoyable.   Some of the text is a little different from the SNES version you might remember but nothing major so far.    The worst part so far is the control pad...it is really hard to get used to and could use some tweaking....perhaps something more along the lines of what Final Fantasy Dimensions contained.   No other complaints, the game game runs well.   Full Review   
 Love the game but hate.... The game is great. Only thing I have a complaint about is it needs an internet connection to launch every time.... I understand doing it once in while, like once or twice a month every time is ridiculous.   Full Review   
 Favorite game of my childhood Only thing i don't  like is the directional pad center moves around screen want option to anchor it more like the snes emulator easier to use fine controls.   Full Review   
 Was great, but is stuck in a loop Battling to protect Banon, half way through the game, a soldier reached him so now I get to watch the same 1 second of game play perpetually. Dumb. Lazy.   Full Review   
 Online only SNES game? Bought this for plane flights with no connectivity, for which it is completely useless. Game won't even open.   Full Review   
 I still hate the fishing, but... Overall I can't come up with a good complaint, bringing back one of my favourite childhood jrpg's just melts my heart. 5/5 nostalgia stars   Full Review   
 Seriously? The game is very enjoyable. There are some MAJOR problems though. Sabins blitz commands aren't in the game. And the game freezes is Thamasa. Has anyone gotten past this? Without spoiling anything it's right when Kefka says "illusion". Cyan is actually useful now because you don't have to wait while he charges. You select the command and he waits while you can give your other characters commands. The control out of battle is a bit weird. Fix the freezing issue and I'll give it a 5 star.  *Fixed bugs.   Full Review   
 Great game but some issues with this version. A few things.. #1. People have already mentioned that the game should be accessible offline and I definitely agree with this. #2. Is it possible to 'fix' the d-pad rather than having it come up and go away? It would be so much less hassle if it could just stay in a place. With the way it is now, it jumps around and gets extremely annoying! #3. Is there a setting to make the screen not turn off while the game is open? This is also quite irritating and causes the game to crash at times =/   Full Review   
 Very great This is a very great version of this game good work on making it but the only setback is that it drains battery very quick other than that its great   Full Review   
 Clunky interface, but excellent game D-pad is not good. It's too big and doesn't disappear immediately when we remove our finger from the screen. It's really frustrating at times. Wayward Soul is much better in that respect. It's easily fixed and I hope they will do it. Battle control are not perfect either, but good enough. Drains a LOT of battery. Overall it's still very enjoyable. My favorite FF of all time! The game by itself is 5 stars. The port, only 4 stars, which saddens me. I want to give 5, but honestly can't. Still recommended!   Full Review   
 Game is fantastic, controls VERY ANNOYING This is my favorite game, yet the controls are blocky and the lag on movement is horrible, I'm to the end of the world of balance about 17hrs of gameplay and I still have not been able to get adjusted to the controls, I feel bad for first time players especially for parts that are timed like the Opera scene/ultros I had to redo 2x myself considering it's impossible to not run into/avoid enemies and even worse walls because of the movement controls. Furthermore, controls+sprint shoes=WORSE FIX PLEASE   Full Review   
 Classic game. Great port. FFVI easily ranks high on my list of my favorite games of all time. I don't know how many times I've played through it in the past, but it definitely a game I can play over and over so I had to buy this. My first impressions of this port are extremely positive. The graphics look great and I love that you can play it entirely and comfortably with one hand. Easily one of the better Final Fantasy games. I couldn't recommend this more.   Full Review   
 Fantastic game, sometimes glitchy This is a great port of FFVI! It has all of the awesomeness of the original and more, with achievements making it even more challenging and fun. The quick save feature helps when issuse arise with your phone. The app crashes from time to time, most frequently when Gau returns from learning rage techs in the Veldt, wasting a lot of valuable time when trying to do so. Other than that, great game!   Full Review   
 Great additional content, graphics, auto battle! My favorite game for SNES. Many improvements in this iOS version are appreciated! The D-pad is based on where you touch the screen, which makes tonnes of sense, because at different points in the game you want to move the D-pad so you can see surroundings. Dragons den is fantastic add-on. Love quick save option. Some of the updated translations are better, some worse. I wish combat controls were clearer, I select the wrong monster all the time. Never crashes, runs smooth on HTC One M8. Buy this!   Full Review   
 Great game. Draconian online only DRM. This is a great port of an amazing game. The controls are a bit dodgy, but the game is otherwise fantastic. The biggest black mark against the game which prevents me from giving a five star rating is the disgusting anti-consumer DRM that requires you always be online to play the MOBILE game you paid for. This game is essentially a rental since you'll no longer be able to play it when the authentication servers are shut down. Remove the DRM and I'll give it five stars.   Full Review   
 Improved Got this on a sale and was bugged by a horrible control lag.  The lag is gone now,  we'll,  almost.  So here's 5 stars ✨  time to relive my most cherished rpg memory 😁   Full Review   
 Great Game & Work... Loved this game growing up and with the face lift this app gave it Love it still. No problems with loading, saving, Internet connection, cursor, nor Sabins Blitz cursor which was worried wasn't going to be smooth when downloading but in fact works great. Minor issue in recovering Locke from Star Mountain Range, when using Strago, Mog character shows in place of during battle scenes, though all actions including Lore remains. Look Greatly Forward to continuing the Final Fantasy collection, completed all prev   Full Review   
 Crummy Control I purchased this game thinking I would  be playing one of my all-time favorite Final Fantasy games. Everything is here , including some revamped graphics. However; the game suffers from very poor controls. I've tried the 4 way and the 8-way controls. Each lags severely. Also at key points in the game , it can disrupt gameplay. 1 key place is the opera scene. I hate that my experience with this awesome game has been tarnished simply by game controls. And, I honestly wish there was a way to get my money back.   Full Review   
 Can't stop I can't stop playing this game. Had every version sense the SNES. Story never gets old and the main villain you can't help but love and hate   Full Review   
 Awesome. Always wanted to experience this game and now I finally get to on a touchscreen!!! The cloud save is an awesome feature! I can play seamlessly with more than one device. The game has awesome music. Only problem w the game is that I wish thr graphics were morr consistant. Either redo all the graphics one way, or leave it.   Full Review   
 Very nice mobile remaster Brings back a lot of memories. If you are a ff fan then it's worth the admission.   Full Review   
 Not perfect I just finished ff4 and ff5 on android and both were good.  Ff6, the on screen controller is much more clumsy feeling than 4 or 5.  My other major complaint is that it crashes when you try to open it while offline.   Full Review   
 Best Game of All Time I was a long time fan of ff7, and always scoffed at those who said this game was better. Well, I stand corrected. This game changed how I perceive reality; it really is that excellent. The movement can be a bit squirrelly at times but the game is so sexy that it is easily overlooked. Buy it.   Full Review   
  I have no idea why, but this game consumes a *ton* of battery.  It even seems to use battery even while it's in the background, unless you force close.  Combined with the DRM that requires an Internet connection to play, and you may have trouble getting this game to run on wi-fi only devices while travelling.   Full Review   
 Great format Great integration to a mobile device.  The format is great and easy to use.  Loved it way back when and love it now.   Full Review   
 The game is awesome and works great. Just one problem Looks great and runs good but there is no way to save the game data on the external sd. This is bad because I can't have II III IV and this at the same time   Full Review   
 Always loved FF6 for the snes Love this game, replayed so many times, not sure what the point in changing Terra's name at one point was for, but still love this game   Full Review   
 Love the game but... The quick save feature just cost me hours of play time. If your party falls, don't let it load the data itself because it'll load the last file saved at a save point and delete your quick save... :(   Full Review   
 WTF this is a good game, but all of my saves SUDDENLY DISAPEARED (after a phone update?)......what's going on! So upset wth   Full Review   
 Brilliant so long as you have internet Brilliant game, never played the original but the story and play is really good. That being said, you do need an internet connection to even start it so I would advise (as others have) against this if you had planned on doing this whilst travelling without frustration!   Full Review   
 5 star if the controls weren't awful Love the game and the graphics look great. The only flaw is the on screen controls. Just awful. Forget about wearing sprint boots.   Full Review   
 Crashes still Man, I love this game, but I can't play it. After a few minutes of playing, I get a message saying that Google Play is experiencing unknown issues. Then directly after the next battle is over, the game crashes. I'll sometimes make it Mt. Koltz but only because quick save automatically marks my progress at each new area. I've never gotten past Vargas without a crash. All my other apps work fine.   Full Review   
 Best game ever But online based and the fact its on 50% sale while the price doesnt change. And the developers dont care much about customer service   Full Review

Some events require runes, like, Nicks Treasure thing, which required you to pay Runes only to get lucky to get Runes, liek, wut? People do complain about the Vigor system, I don't mind since I don't play for a long time, I'm also not aiming for the top. It also does run a little slow, but, that's only my device, so, not a big deal. Overall, if you're looking for a decent MMO, try it out. But, if you aim for the top, avoid it.   Full Review

  DO NOT SPEND REAL MONEY ON THIS GAME.  I paid for a 'One time offer' deal in the Diamond shop. Paid about $30 on a deal for a 'Special sack of diamonds'. Didn't get what I paid for. Contacted support and got told several times I was blatantly lying. Sent the photos of the game for proof, also sent them the receipt I got in the mail for it. They then tell me: "Well you can purchase it again if you want then."  Why would anyone buy something again if they didn't get what they paid for in the first place??? I'm not going to walk into a store, buy something and only get half of what I paid for. That doesn't make sense. What a money grabbing company that they can't help the paying customers with issues.  If you have ANY issues with money, they will pretty much laugh at you and tell you the answer is to spend more on the game instead of fixing the issue.   Full Review

The sponsors try hard to confuse you and redirect you off track - even if you are able to navigate their maze of redirection, they rarely pay out. You can play for free but it will take you forever to be competitive vs. people who spend money. Basically it is a pay to win game, but it is pretty addictive.   Full Review

Seriously, save your money for a company that actually gives a crap about their players. March 16th Update: So, since you begged for a new rating after the update, how about minus 2 stars?  You claim bug fixes, yet the bugs of "try again in a minute", the searching bar staying on screen, and the "search for miscrit" and "click to collect" bars staying on the screen persist.  You also still have not bothered to respond to bug reports, or fixed the forums so new players can actually post when your Player Support wont accept emails.   The game itself is better than this.
