title: Miscrits: World of Creatures

reviews:
Cannot type into new account boxes When trying to create an account to sign in, the keyboard comes up but nothing appears in the text boxes.   Full Review   
 Very cool The game has sync issues with the propriety accounts but if you dont mind it on one device then go for it   Full Review   
 repetitive but fun balanced gameplay, some grinding required at lower levels in order to survive later on but still, fun game. levels get a bit repetitive after a while - walk a few steps, kill a mob, walk a few steps, kill a mob... storyline is virtually non existent. love simple hack&slash with a sprinkle of rpg-style leveling? then this a game you'll like.   Full Review   
 Run, don't hide from your foe. A little of skeleton here, a little of ghoul there, a witch's brew and you've got a mish-mash of monsters and creatures to slash and hack through. Nice game. Add some more to the hero's dialogue.   Full Review   
 Great game There's a few minor bugs, but I love the gameplay. It's really easy and a lot of fun. I'm a huge Neverwinter fan and I honestly like this game a lot more.   Full Review   
  This game is so addictive and fun! I can't believe I'm still playing it. There are vary few mobile games that I will play consistently and this is definitely one of them. I love that the ads are not intrusive so they do not interrupt game play, very good choice.   Full Review   
 Great Game I love this game and find it to be great graphics for a phone game. The only thing that bothers me is it won't let you type in anything to save it.  The keyboard comes up but nothing appears in the boxes that I've typed. Please fix!!!!!   Full Review   
 great diablo remake on smartphones smooth music, similar gameplay and layouts, crafting system, gemstones, all is very well balanced and sorted out. Since the last patch thou, unlocking boxes with gem reward will require your personal information so you can participate in surveys. Ingame premium shop is more expensive and the game performance has decreased. Beware that other steppes might be: reducing the gembox/rare items droprate and raising the amount of ingame currency for some features. Also, disconnected from google play games   Full Review   
 Great time "Waster" Got 5 minutes to burn? Good game to play. Got an hour to burn? Decent game to play.  The pop-up adverts are annoying,  but quite easy to play without having to spend money.  Simple controls with nice effects and mildly amusing character dynamics top it off as one of my favourite mobile phone games.   Full Review   
 Good game 3 stars only just because you enforced boring and repetitive leveling grind in order to cope with main bosses in 2nd and 3rd stage. 2nd one was somewhat fun, but 3rd one was massively overpowered. Im level 51 atm, grinded from L35, legendary and epic gear, and he could still easily one shoot me, or jump on me or drain me soo easily. Also giving free diamonds for 5 star rating, isn't this a cheating?   Full Review   
 Great Little Diablo-like Fun little RPG. Better than generally everything on the Play store. Yes it's a bit repetitive and can be grindy, but overall it feels less amateurish than most. Plus a single $1 purchase removes ads AND gives you gear. That's some real developer generosity.  Just make it clearer you can use ONLY Google Play or a dedicated sign in. I had tons of errors signing in until I realized I could only use one or the other, and obviously I'd rather use Google Play to track achievements.   Full Review   
 Mystical fun! Love the save your teammates, band together, and defeat evil scheme.   Full Review   
 Enjoyable grindfest Flows nicely from one battle to the next. Lots of item drops, and the crafting system is satisfying. Easy to freeplay so long as you are patient and happy to grind gems, but the crafting and attack upgrade times may be frustrating to those who want to binge the game as soon as possible. EDIT: 2016/5/6: very responsive developer regarding glitches, really impressed.   Full Review   
 Nice Design, But Purchased Items are Poor Value Nice Diablo game style. Indicators, screen layout efficient, nice! But, feels like you need a town to come home to when not fighting. Using char menu to craft, upgr, buy/sell items is efficient, but feels weird like game unfinished. Game cash/items NOT good value. Doesn't give enough in relation to cost. Stormblade SUX, waste of $$. WHY do this?? Game gives gems freely, but use lame schemes like keeping ur tiny bag full and make it costly to expand. Support too biased, refute problems +dont pass it on 2 fix   Full Review   
 Fun RPG. I play a lot of RPG's. This one is really fun, very simple. The ads you can choose to watch is a good as to get gems. So you're not constantly spending money. Good game, good graphics.  Good fun.   Full Review   
 Fun game but cannot save marmelade error This is a great game, perfectly free to play. But I have lost ALL my progress for the 3th time now in 2 days, I log in to my account and ALWAYS without exception get that marmalade error saying the downloaded header is not the same as the server stored one. I will not commit to this game if I can lose all progress at any time. Please help!   Full Review   
 Short game. This game has a great feel to it. Easy controls and addicting. The only downside is that the game is short. Managed to beat the whole thing in about a week. Now I'm stuck having to replay the same levels on a different difficulty. It needs more to do or it gets old quick.   Full Review   
 Latest update removed gplay cloud saving Latest update forces you to make a new account with "Making Fun Inc" to save progress (for use with multiple devices) or else. Until now GPlay was used and working great for mobile and/or tablet gaming; M&M was the great game that had gone the extra mile in usability, worth the money spent in it. But as others already said, I too draw the line when forced like this. Dissapointed. From 5* down to 1* until there is a choice or changes are reverted.   Full Review   
 Rating changed Forced closed after the update. Issue happens when using skills to mobs. Had cleared my ram, increased memory, reinstall the game already. Will change rating once fixed.   Full Review   
 Love it Top down dungeon crawler, really fun and addictive, best part, you can play as much as you want! There is no energy with a stupid timer so you have to wait, just queue up the next level and your good to go!   Full Review   
 ok game, graphics are nice I don't know what you are trying to accomplish with this save feature you are pushing on 3veryone, but the form doesn't work, whatever I put in, drops to a single letter. and that's all fields, so it doesn't work.   Full Review   
 Does not work Does not work on my phone. Keeps giving me a uuid error. Also, just another silly tap screen Action rpg. Might as well add controller support or convert to handheld consoles.   Full Review   
 5 stars for 50 free gems. Rate this game 5 stars for 50 free gems. That's probably why this game is so highly rated. Its super easy. And it's the same thing over and over.   Full Review   
 Keep up the great apps Love that there's no waiting for life energy to build up, just log in and straight into the good stuff   Full Review   
 Can't save Since the update it's asking me to save my game to an account. When I attempt to fill in the info it only let's me type the first letter of username, email and pw. Note 5. Tried several different times, rotated, rebooted still same thing.   Full Review   
 Bsd update bad update.  GS7 - crashes on exit, account creation broken, VERY bad nerf of lightening bolt.  it targets objects and no longer penetrates.  unhappy paying customer.   Full Review   
 Almost perfect game You'll learn everything pretty much by level 15 and get a good feel for the game. One thing is missing to me. There should be 5-10 classes to start with will make the game x100 more addictive, that will generate more income and traffic for the game.   Full Review   
 Just what I was looking for Great game, a lot of fun without having to pay money.  Everything I was looking for in an action RPG and more.  Fun gameplay, upgrades, tons of weapons and armor, simple and easy crafting. Wish I would have found this sooner.  Highly recommended.   Full Review   
 Good game Fun rpg with good mechanics. Free and no ads unless you want gems, so far it's a pretty good time killer   Full Review   
 Interesting F2P game Had an issue with the account creation. I can't seem to create an account without it prompting me that I have keyed in incorrect symbols ( only shows up what I key when I chose each letter which added additional space in-between each letter apparent). Good game with frequent patches.   Full Review   
 A problem. First off the game doesnt respond to my Samsung keyboard so i couldn't make an account.  Not that it would of mattered because i got past the first two quest then it freezes on the 3rd saying "updating  new content " which makes no sense since i just installed the dumb game. The gameplay and mechanics were awesome which is why its a 2 star rating.. this game has potential just not with me.   Full Review   
 Love this game New update wont let me save my date username email and password wont let me type anything in the boxes   Full Review   
 Lightning power fail My lightning power on my mage character change.. Bfre u can use it to enemy it pass through the walls.. Now it change saddddd 😖😖😖   Full Review   
 Great Almost like Diablo..which would still be a killer game if it was made just like this...my 2 cents anywAys   Full Review   
 Like to do battle Like the Way I can find better items. Some of the lock box are to high. Makes you buy gems.   Full Review   
  Ads nice I can skip them but they pop up in the middle of a fight and it's easy to accidentally click on it. Had to come back and lower my rating because as I got farther in the game it started overheating my cpu within a couple of minutes of starting the game.😢   Full Review   
  Was fun until last update. Not a fan of the additional "do survey for gems" ontop of watching ads for them.   Full Review   
 Can't play, get spam It worked fine until I created a account.  Now crashes during start up, and I have to deal with them having my email   Full Review   
 Nice but.... This is a great game but crafting system needs major help. Had to take away a star for ridiculous surveys during game play. And a star because of crazy long time crafting. Disappointed waited so long for an upgrade and well I excepted more.   Full Review   
 Cool Game but... I'm having a lot of fun with this game.  Played to level 50, and it has stayed entertaining. Grinding for premium currency isn't too tedious. I don't make much RL money, and definitely not enough to spend on a casual game. Every so often the NPCs will drop an opportunity to earn gems by watching a short advertisement.  The latest update added the option to complete a survey. I'd rather let Kanye West handle my finances than enter my information into an online survey, so I'm dropping my rating by two stars.   Full Review

  Was fine up until the last update when it lost all my progress in the arena please can this be sorted or i'll be uninstalling   Full Review

  5 stars easily.i love it.   Full Review

 I love it Make more heroes   Full Review

reviews:
It's my favorite mobile game but seriously arena cheats you by giving the opponent way more turns. You will be shocked when they get 3 to 5 turns per monster while you get 1 turn and maybe 2 once in a while. I am not exaggerating. 4* for this.   Full Review   
 One thing Could you guys lower the ammount required for a guild battle? I am in a small guild that doesn't have 10 people but we all really want to do guild battles...we can't seem to recruit enough people either   Full Review

 NB*5 Give me com2üs more NB*5 monsters. Give me also Light Oracle Laima. Thanks. Asia Server, Username: MuSi|Ace.ph☀   Full Review   
 Com2Us Help me Pls!!! Good Day Com2Us, I would like to concern something, why I cant enter to the Game after I update it? Please Com2Us Help me Fix this. I really miss my Dark Penguin. T.T   Full Review   
 try to make it a little bit easy too many mystery scroll,hard to find a best monster. 50 times i'd try to power up stone,im  wasting a lot of mana stone for this but ive got not.im starting to hate this game   Full Review   
 Love it, when it works. I love you guys, but it seems every other patch ends with me not being able to play at all. I literally cannot even log on without getting kicked off almost instantly. P.S. Could you change the 2nd Fire Archangel I got to literally any other 5 star? He's without a home. :(   Full Review

 "Money wars" thats what it should be called... The game is fun but very limiting. Crystals and mana stones are the most prevalent resource but they are nigh unobtainable besides paying for them. The methods they do have to get them in the game; are useless. 30 hours to get 3 crystals, seriously? When it cost 75 to summon and cheapest purchase is 20. Summoning becomes impossible besides the lower level scrolls which say 1-3 stars but more like 1-2. Fun game if your willing to buy your happiness.   Full Review   
 Good time passer Love the style of the units and there's almost always something you could be doing in game. Just the RNG of this game is somewhat the weakest link that holds it back.   Full Review   
 This game ruined my life After so much time  so much money  I am sitting here constantly taking it up the rear end by com2us and its business model. which is the rich get rich and the poor remain poor this game has now forced my child my unborn child to go to public schools. This game now has made it so that I have to take out a second mortgage. I strongly advise that you avoid downloading at all costs save yourself from the madness. you would rather vote for Donald Trump then play this game for one day.   Full Review

It makes no sense, I've had enough speed n my Internet it's OK, I play other games that require more speed n they do not fail or droop, this is just something you guys need to fix, until then I simply quit n unstaill, I love the game but now I get grumpy n frustrated, sucks   Full Review

At first glance I though this may be unfair but the thing is that as you continue to play you develop a team for different things being Raid, Guild Wars, ToA, PvE and PvP there is not such a thing one size fits all in this game. Every monster contributes to a specific roll that being DPS, Tank, Buffer, Healer or Debuffer is up to you to take your team to the next level.   Full Review

 Star Wars - at least Disney & Lucasfilm says so... Story: 3 (you are a smuggler in the Star Wars universe between RoJ and FA, the story arc is okay.  Not great, not bad, okay.)  Gameplay: 2.5 (interface is often wonky, errors occur frequently, force closes happen weekly.)  Freemium: 4 (it's hard but you can complete the game without paying for anything.  But it will take FOREVER.  That's not an exaggeration, end game requirements will force you into direct competition with people who have been playing since launch and you have to rank in Sector Battles for "Event Crystals" to meet upgrade requirements.)  Sector Battles: -2 Competing directly against people who have been around so long they have literally every item in the game, is hard.  But to get the advertised Force abilities or Lightsaber you WILL have to compete for event crystals.  Even then, it will take months.  Customer Support: -75 (a team of rabbits weasels with sore teeth would be more friendly and helpful.  They treat you as if you're a liar trying get over on them because their game is perfect.  Of course, when the "multi award wimming" game director, their boss, calls people who give harsh feedback a bunch of whiners, what do you expect?)  Pass this game up.   Full Review

 Typical carrot on a stick Simple progression grinder, nothing special but an adequate time killer. Just accept you will not get any where fast in this obvious cash cow and be patient. When South Park did the freemium gaming bit, they were satirising games like this, so fair warning. The controls in this game are really poor, often taps not registering or the character not going to the designated point. That is really the only difficulty i've found in this game, fighting the controls is what makes the game any challenge, and this is not how it should be. The challenge should come from well designed content.   Full Review

title: Age of Warring Empire

reviews:
The game itself is fine, but do not purchase gems with real money as they will not give you the gems and they will not refund your money.  This is the email response I received from Rumble - "As that particular pricing is being offered in error, it is not presently being honored by Rumble".  Complete rubbish.    After what they laughingly call customer service to resolve this issue, they continue to refuse to refund the purchase price or credit the gems to my account.  Like I said, the game is good, but do not spend real money on gems.   Full Review

  That game has a simple system that works quite well. For a moment.   It gets extremely repetitive after you hit lvl50 with your hunter, which is, by the way, the max level for your hunter when your guardians can hit lvl60... (Has nobody noticed that at nhn ? Or are you all just lazy ?) To sum it up, the game goes from dungeon crawling to exp & rune (what you need to evolve your guardians) farming and then, level 50, it's just plain zombie (exp material for your guardians) farming and occasional boss fights...   Another annoying point is the bad level of English that is written all over the app, let me get you an example:  "freeze souls appears near philly and heavily damages for 10 seconds"  Another example is the developers too stupid to double check their texts for typos, it's been since the daily missions update (1 month or so) that the "arean" typo hasn't been corrected.  On the bright side, for a free to play, the paying elements aren't too invasive even though the prices are ridiculous, and don't really block you from getting sick guardians, even though luck has the biggest role here.   In conclusion, not a bad game, but the developing team behind it really needs to step up their game and give it a real fresh breath   Full Review   
  It's an okay game for it's genre. I've played a number of them in search for one that doesn't become a boring grindfest. But this isn't it unfortunately, as after awhile it does become a grindfest. The AI won't be able to clear anything on it's own, even stages ten levels below it's own level.   And on the subject of AI is the Guardians seem have a bug, I like to believe it's a bug, where they won't attack the enemy and just follow you around even though the enemy is right there and is chasing you. I play primarily as a sorceress, so ranged combat. Happened to me in a boss raid and on stage play.   And then there is the arena/coliseum, which is straight up autoplay with little control from you beyond pick teams and poking their portraits. While yes I use autoplay, it can get really dull watching idiot AIs fight..I know their health is suppose to compensate for their simplistic AI. Maybe I got use to my other game that is also a grind but the AI clears it pretty quick (faster if it's a lower stage) as the AI isn't as stupid and can clear things on their own.   Full Review   
 Error for indosat provider -_- Hello, why all indosat provider having problem on loginng in?? Its same like weeks ago, Others provider telkomsel and XL can login sue error for indosat provider, please fix it ASAP or all indosat provider will out from this game... Thank you.   Full Review

I agree that it now needs more levels and a new section, I would also like to see more options to develop your hunter beyond level 50. Overall very enjoyable though.   Full Review

 Comment It's a good game. needs minor bug fixing. I used a 500day speed up on a 500day wild troop research and it crashed. twice this happened before I had to use a third 500day speed up before the research time was effected by the actual speed up. that's 1500 days used on a 500 day research, I've had this issue few times using all kinds of speed ups.  also problems regarding 3 day shields dropping within hours of activating. I lost billions of resources due to this. other than these issues. great game! 👍   Full Review   
 Can't stand the increased pack prices Stop increasing prices each time I buy a pack. You should offer the same deals. For instance I bought a $19.99 pack, now all that is available is the $49.99 packs. Sure the cheap worthless packs are still at the bottom but there's nothing in them. I can't buy a $50 pack on my cell bill, but I can buy a bunch of $20 ones. You're pi**ing in the wind with that move.   Full Review   
  I would give a 0 if I could because you can't even keep everything in balance. It needs to be a sideways app instead of having to hold it up. Everything is too small. Athenas breasts are inappropriate.    >=·(   Full Review   
 No Gold The game has cheated me out of about 15k gold so far, most of that came from Athena's prize in global gifts which was 6k which I hit collect and did not get it. Then again in Athena's gift but it was 5k. The rest came from alliance gifts.   Full Review   
 Game of Wallets For a free game It's all about how deep your pockets are, spent 15 dollars and a year game only got worse, it would be cool again if the power structure was reevaluated where 1 billion players are all in the same kingdom that would let the spenders fight it out like they want and leave the free players battling it out on their own, playing for free NO possible way of getting complete set cores as they change weekly at times   Full Review   
  This game was fun and addictive until level 15. After it, it is only fun for those who purchase items and shields with real-life money. This puts you in a huge disadvantage if you are trying to keep playing without spending money.   Full Review   
 Greed is not fun Once upon a time it took strategy to play this game,  now it only requires a blank check.  Perfection in game performance has been replaced with a sub par application that only wants you to dump money into it.   Full Review   
 DeathBelowU Its a great game if they would not give thousands of materials cores and debuffs that you. Already have now pay for in packs and just get more copies for as much as most of us put in the game we should be getting WAY BETTER EVERYTHING BUT NOPE! Just more crap you dont need so get this game back to GREATNESS before i quit it thank you sincerely from all of us loyal players?   Full Review   
 Don't play it! Scam! This game addictive. The bad part is it, you have to spend  $1000 a month for packs that is SCAM!. You pay big money for the seek of hoping the chest will complete a set of gear but it never doesn't. It takes like 5 packs(500$) at least to complete a set if you were lucky!  So don't west your money or time! Plus too many adds!! By the way there are 12 research trees each one coast you 4× 100$ packs 400 x 12 = 4800$ are you fking nutts! fk you and your game!   Full Review   
 Good gane but.. This is a very good game from being able to hit the towns people to raiding etc... but only bad thing ive seen so far is that i didnt get my first time buyer bonus and nither did my wife .  Still this game is one of my favs out of the play store.   Full Review   
 Online Have you noticed that people are starting to quit playing? I tried to make an account in a newer kingdom and almost everyone is inactive at this point.. ONE month after it was created. That's because to survive you need to buy packs and the wait times are ridiculous. Fix this cause not all of us are wanting to pay to play   Full Review   
 Please Read Hey, this game is awesome but I'm having trouble, I have a strong internet connection but my chat on alliance chat is not sending, also I can't claim Athena's Gift even if they pop-up on my notification, and sometimes my inbox and reports are not loading so does the world map. Please fix and i know you will, thanks :)   Full Review   
 Fun for a week I had a lot of fun with this game the first week I even spent about 15 dollars on it however I'm uninstalling until they balance the game.  The game is not being played the way it was intended to be played.  You're supposed to team up with your guild and attack other or have your guild members help defend your base by sending troops.  But in reality what happens is a max level player teleports right next to your base wipes you out and then teleports away within 30 seconds.  If you have a prisoner you can’t   Full Review   
 SCAM! All they want is $. they don't fix problems or help the players! They just find new ways for you to spend THOUSANDS of dollars. Researches and the new buildings take masive amounts of ress and speed ups! Dump 10 thousand dollars into the game and you'll have a good starting point!.   Full Review   
 Money spending game be warned ,play Rival kingdom instead!!!!!, GOW you suck money from players Before you download ,know this!!! This game is only 30MB wow that nice, not!!!¡!!. it still downloads up to 1GB of data when you first start playing then you need a data plan of 10GB a month only God knows why,200MB every 20mins wtf ,your phone overheats ,meaning your finger tips burn on contact to the screen and sadly you will need to spend at 100$ to 300$ to progress a bit in the game,if you don't have money don't waist you time on this game😥   Full Review   
 Not E for everyone as rated... Extremely expensive  to advance and level up and if you don't, it takes a long time to advance ie thousands and thousands  of days for some researches or trainings   Full Review   
 best online game ever very addictive, can be expensive,  great social networking,  can be free and have  alot of fun.   Full Review   
 WHERE IS MY PACK???????? I just spent 20 on a secret vip pack and I didn't receive my purchased pack, I have email receipt from paypal, I expect some kind of compensation for loss of time and attempting to rob me as well as don't expect me to spend anymore cash on this game.   Full Review   
 nope! thought it was fun, slowly developing my stronghold, tooke me ages to do, take my shield off for 2 seconds and i lose everything! all my troops! my resources!...DO NOT DOWNLOAD this game unless you have no life! it seems to be the only way to actually be able to do anything at all!   Full Review   
 Pay 2 win Same garbage as all build games. If you don't pay thousands you will get wrecked. Some people already have billions in troops. Avoid this game like it's AIDS.   Full Review   
 Money pit, save yourself the headache Not sure where they are getting those screenshots because the actual game doesn't remotely look that good. This game is an ENDLESS money pit. It is very addictive and the more powerful you are, the more you can play. The most powerful players are the ones that spend a lot of $$ and you never get enough even when you do. Can't even get a new character without spending 100 bucks. It's bs.   Full Review   
 Money sink MZ just wants your money, the game quality has completely degraded over the last year. MZ has repeatedly lied about fixing issues and then just ignored the issue. Don't bother getting started it's not worth the waste of time or money that Machine Zone has turned this game into.   Full Review   
 Fun game Now that I understand what I'm doin I love the game. I did link my Facebook to the game under a different game and gmail. How can I get my Facebook link to this account because I have gone so much father now than I did on my other account   Full Review   
 Highway robbery So you guys need to quit raising pack prices. IE: I had a choice of several packs for 19.99 I bought one and the other exact same packs are suddenly 49.99. Then it goes to 99.99. So if you want to win events or you're short on patience this game is not for you unless you got money to burn cause the makers seem to think thier stuff is made of platinum. The higher level you get the longer things take talking months. Those packs you see at beginning for low price you will never see again once you buy.   Full Review   
 Poor service U can't log in the game it stays at 50percent . After spending thousands on this game mz have no reply to me the game kick me off when I was getting attacked i couldn't logback in lost  everything all bec the game is not working . After spending so much money u expect and answer to Wat happen or replace Wat i lost but noting form MZ . It's a big waste of time and money . It's like there stealing from u has a player . Just to get u to spend more .   Full Review   
 Pathetic Customer Service Items missing takes days for a response and when you finally receive one, they don't understand your problem and can't help.I have spent a thousand dollars on this game and with a single glitch you stuck. Untill you spend another 99.$. And even then it can disappear before you use it.   Full Review   
 Super expensive no support So you will need to spend thousands of dollars to compete. When the game glitches they always say it's your fault. So if you loose a couple $100 packs in troops because of the game you will not get help. The graphics are bland and never change. It's not worth getting into. If you do decide to try buy someone's else already developed empire.   Full Review   
 Better be rich to play this game While this game may be free to play, unless you're just looking for a reason to chat, the scales are tipped heavily in favor of the fortunate. Don't bother downloading this game if you can't handle being completely useless and meaningless, UNLESS you can literally spend hundreds of dollars a month... Literally. Machine Zone appears to care less about player inequality and more about lining their pockets, and it shows. I'll admit, the chat & drama are fun, but i wish i never made friends in this game.   Full Review   
  There are a lot of ads. In fact, the app is slow to load because of the one that shows when you first start up the game. Aside from that minor issue is the game play, which would be fun if you didn't have to worry about griefing from players with more power. While it is free to download and play, this is very much a pay to win app. Otherwise, progression is very slow for those starting out.   Full Review   
 Hmm I've played this game many times and spent a decent amount of money on it, I love this game and how challenging it is. Lately I have not been able to play the game for more than just a minute or two before it crashes, please fix this issue   Full Review   
  You will loose every time!!! This due to the fact that players who have played this game from the very first are so powerful that they can come wipe you out anytime they please. So, after spending several hundreds if not thousands on this game and to loose all that money in a matter seconds is almost like stealing ng real money from you. I am convinced that this game is controlled by a bunch of immature little thrives that if they decide they don't like you will just simply steal everything from you so you just get upset and quit. DO NOT WASTE TOUR MONEY ON THIS GAME!!!!!   Full Review   
 Super addictive Good game if you're prepared to pay serious money to even out the playing field. Without spending the money it's not a game of war, but a game of shield, as that is all you will do. Most frustrating part is when they offer a purchase advertised at 90% off but you only actually get 10% of what you would get from a full price pack... How can you do this?! Customer service is non existent, if you ever have a problem... tough!   Full Review
title: Game of War - Fire Age

reviews:
Great game Question. Why is it that my 5th level Dwarf has no skills at all? He doesn't even have a skill menu tree.   Full Review   
 Great game but... I'd rather pay for the full game once, instead of being forced to buy chunk by chunk, in reality it gets more expensive than PC or console titles, otherwise well made and fun to play.   Full Review   
 I like the game BUT I bought this game last night on steam with the DLC pack. I enjoyed it thoroughly and found out there was this app. I bought it and thought that if the was a combined DLC that I could purchase it I would as well because I like the access to the different characters. Instead it looks like I have to buy them all individually as well as the other DLC content. The game is $5 and add at least 21 more on top of that, I just can't bring myself to do it. So I well be paying more on my phone to get the same content.   Full Review   
 To straight forward I played the game for a few hours and found out very monotonous. Enter dungeon, click on enemies, they die. A little disappointing after playing Space Wolf which had a captivating combat system   Full Review   
 Entertaining nostalgia (update: game stopped working for me. Stuck synching cloud saves. Can't play.) Love the game vibe. Takes me back. Highly entertaining if you like levelling.   Full Review   
 Gets boring after a while There isn't enough variety an after a while it just gets dull. So much so that after completing the first set of quests I have no desire to buy more. Maybe my mistake. Uninstall.   Full Review   
 Cloud sync issue I love this game but alas I can no longer play as it just says cloud syncing and does nothing totally unplayable, such a shame.......don't worry I have sorted now, the sync issue is to do with available space   Full Review   
 Amazing port of one of the best board games ever Please tell me there are more characters and more factions of enemies coming. Possibly multi-player?   Full Review   
 Great until level 6 After level 6 the difficulty ramps up to stupid levels.  You will encounter wave after wave of adds until your party wipes or you bail. This happens in every dungeon and if,  as is frequently the case,  your warriors whiff like blind men you haven't got much chance. I love this game but after level 6 there are serious balance issues.  I have most of the DLC and any party combo I've tried has the same result after level 6. I give this game 5 stars until level 6 and 1 star after.   Full Review   
 Excellent production values, font size issues Still very early, but really good so far.  Only problem at this point is that the font is TINY on my Nexus 7 tablet - almost unreadable.  Haven't found a way to alter that, if it exists.   Full Review   
 my moneyyyyy after play for a while I discovered that I can't continue further because I need to purchase more map..  wtf...   Full Review   
 All about money It is a good game but you have to buy more levels which makes this game very expensive.  Just say its 25 dollars one time, but then it wouldn't sell.  Many other big games you can continue without paying ( clash of clans, sim city etc..).   Full Review   
 Warhammer quest Really love this game so I spent money! Now it freezes on cloud sync...... Give me my £20.00 back!!!...thanks to sage advice I cleared out some storage space it worked!!!! Back to the war :))   Full Review   
 Bummer!!! This is a great game but I have just found out that the developer no longer holds the licence so they won't be adding anymore content to it…kind of feel I have been ripped off after actually spending money on d.l.c (something I have never done before)   Full Review   
  Enjoyed at first, but the undead/vampire DLC will now lock up my game if there are any zombies at the end of combat.  Is there a way to fix this?   Full Review   
 Loving it! I play the table tops and love the graphics, gameplay, and strategies.   Oh and waaaaa!!  Guess what if you load a pay for play game and have to buy extras in game then don't  cry about.  I purchased  all the extras and they are worth it!!!!   Full Review   
 Good game This is a lot of fun. It would be great if there was a menu button to exit the game for nexus 6p. Edit: I found that you can swipe from the top to get the phone buttons to show up.   Full Review   
 Amazing Everything runs perfectly great game play   Full Review   
 Great game Fun to play still got the original game   Full Review   
 Great Only played it for a short while but so far really good.   Full Review   
  Polished adaption of tabletop game .   Full Review   
 Boring Uninteresting game play is very repetitive.   Full Review   
 Awesome! This game is awesome! Not like the other dungeons game! Graphics and UI is good!   Full Review   
  True to the tabletop,just wish they would have added multi-player and the ability to name your warriors...would also love to see more classes like the chaos warrior and wardancer. The iap prices don't bother me as much as others ,1.99 for classes would be better ,but if you think about what the physical prices were,its not to bad...all round its what you think your entertainment dollar is worth   Full Review   
 Text is garbled Could be a good game but all the popups contain random illegible text so i have no idea whats going on :(   Full Review   
 A bad interpretation of Quest I used to play the game as a kid and there was no way you would miss so often nor get ambushes that are stronger than the dungeon's boss super regularly. It is absolutely crazy and ruins the game. The amount of microtransactions the game forces on you to unlock monsters and heroes is also out of this world.   Full Review   
 Great game spoilt by microtransactions Really enjoyed this, it's great fun and quite long and with super little graphics. Sadly though after I paid once I didn't want to pay to unlock almost everything in the game and as a result I felt like I missed a lot of content. I dont mind  paying for an app of this quality but repeatedly demanding money just feels like someone just got a bit greedy.   Full Review   
  Good fun once you got use to it.   Full Review   
  More female characters please!   Great game, but where are the women?  My daughter loves this stuff, but she's very disappointed there is only one female character out of , what is it, twelve?   Gaming and comic conventions have about 25% to 40% female attendance now.  How about at least matching those ratios in your game? Or, and this is just me talking crazy here, how about a 50-50 mix of male and female characters?   Full Review   
 Classic WHQ... for better or worse Just like the classic board game, your warriors will be repeatedly screwed over by unexpected monsters appearing on top of unexpected monsters on top of unexpected monsters.   Full Review   
 Wonderful! I loved the board game, and I love this game! Addictive, simple... actually, much more fun than the board game--no hours of set-up! It would be nice to actually roll dice, like in Talisman, but that is a minor quibble. Great job!   Full Review   
 Fun, but IAP prices limit my interest. 3 stars for the game itself,  +1 star just because someone finally ported it from iOS to Android (Rodeo had no interest in doing so).  I enjoyed the starting region and would probably keep playing if the additional characters, regions, and dungeons were bundled into discounted packs instead of priced as they are.  As it stands, one character isn't worth the money, and the regions don't look like they add enough new elements to justify their cost, either.  On to something else, I suppose.   Full Review   
 Good fun There seems to be some kind of bug with this app which causes it to overheat my phone and run down the battery even after I have exited the game. Ended up having to restart my phone this morning to clear it before I lost all power.   Full Review   
  1 star because it only gives you 5-6 hours of gaming, after that, you have to buy an expansion (5€) or repeat the content again. Fun but repetitive game, but for this kind of prices I would play anything else.   Full Review   
  This game is great (except)  as WITH ALL WARHAMMER GAMES THEY SKREW UP after a short while!!!  I have had to replay old tunnels because my saves don't work!!  I had got my warriors up to a decent standard that took many hours of game play, and when I go back on it, I find that I have lost everything I earned and I'm getting angry,   I paid for this game and I would also spend more to gain more regions,  but why should I, when it keeps going backwards!!!   SORT IT OUT PLEASE,  OR I WILL TELL EVERYONE TO BOYCOTT YOU!!!   Full Review   
  Nice gameplay, story is okay. Unfortunately I encountered a bug in some quests, where the game freezes, but the contact with chilled mouse was really friendly and customer oriented 😀   Full Review   
 Great game, except for the bugs Game stuck on home screen "Syncing Cloud Saves." I have tried reinstalling, but that didnt work along with turning phone on and off. Up to this point I was enjoying the game very much, but it is hard to continue enjoying a game if it doesn't work!   Full Review   
 Cloud saves do not work for me. After a few play sessions, game will not launch past 'Syncing Cloud Saves.'  Graphically pleasing and some good music. Would love to try Tyranid Invasion.   Full Review   
 Fun but... It keeps losing my saves and I have to keep starting over.... what gives?   Full Review   
 Update question Great game, but why does it need to download the whole 520mb again every time there is an update?   Full Review
title: Warhammer Quest

reviews:
An RPG tactic as advertised Game is fantastic overall. Its a tactical rpg, pretty simple and an engrossing story.  Play demo if you want to know more.   Trese bros did a great job with Startrader RPG, 4X, and Heroes of Steel.   New content added since I last played. Neat   Full Review   
 Classic game!! Way better than I expected. If you want dungeon crawling, it has it. If you want story, it has it. If you want interesting game mechanics, it has it. I'm very picky when it comes to games, but this game will d raw you in.   Full Review   
 Brilliant Love this game, hours of dungeon crawling and a great storyline mixed with old school rpg elements. Money well spent :)   Full Review   
  Let us go back and finish quests and I'll give you 5   Full Review   
  Easily best RPG on mobile   Full Review   
  Great game.   Full Review   
 Great game! Pixel Dungeon meets Icewind Dale. Awesome game so far. My only gripe is that its difficult sometimes to move your characters/target enemies because the screen will jiggle as if you are trying to swipe the screen rather than tapping on a tile/target. Samsung Galaxy s5 Neo.   Full Review   
 best developers Trese brothers constantly update & improve games. I played HOS at launch, it is unreal how much it has improved. If you haven't tried any of their games you are missing out   Full Review   
 Is good. Looks like I'm going to get a loooot of play out of this one.   Full Review   
  Very good game full content more than worth the cost keep coming back on my 3rd run through with third different party dynamic   Full Review   
 Good game The game is ok, but i had to reinstall my tablet and i lost all my progress. I thought this game have cloud save... Now I'm not even sure i want to start over.... The game is slow, it will take me a lot of time to redo everything i had so far.   Full Review   
 Love it Can u make rename charather and gender? If u can i love it!!   Full Review   
 When content trumps graphics Do you remember Ultima?  Pool of Radiance? Wizardry? Bard's Tale?  Do you remember when how you built your party was the game,  not how they looked? No need for excessive feats of dexterity - This is turn based.   Just a mind for strategy and the ability to enjoy a fun story.   Full Review   
 Worth it! I am still glad I bought the full version several months later. Others have come and gone, but this game offers skill trees that actually result in different ways to fight.   Full Review   
 Excellent RPG! An excellent fantasy RPG! It is evident that a lot of work and care went into this game, and it is constantly being updated and improved.  Truly a developer worth supporting!   Full Review   
  Love it can be a little challenging but good overall   Full Review   
 Heroes of Feel From the time of the cyber knights beta release i have wanted this game.It was worth the wait.It is intense,but not impossible.Finding synergy between the different characters is the key to victory.buy the optional characters if you can afford them.The artwork for the characters is phenomonal.my only gripe and it's just nitpicking is that we cannot really grind anywhere.it is a crime that this only has 5000 downloads.it's one of their very best.I play it on my galaxy tab and it's much better played on the bigger screen.   Full Review   
 Fire Emblem on my phone. If you like your strategy games, you'll love this.   Full Review   
 really great game ok cool,i was thinking it would be cool if you fuys made a part 2 where you could take tour party from this game at what ever level they are and with all their supplies and gear and start the new adventure with them   Full Review   
  It's a great game, if you're looking for d&d style play with a solid story behind it, this is what you've been looking for   Full Review   
 Old school awesome A true indie gem. A huge game with lots of story, combat, and adventure that gets frequent updates, tons of support, and quick helpful responses from the devs. If you like adventure rpgs buy this. It's wonderful.   Full Review   
  Good game   Full Review   
 Awesome Game!!! These people are awesome!!! They are always doing updates, if you email them suggestions, they will return your email rather quickly. I can't say enough of how great this game is. The story line keeps you drawn in. If you don't believe me just try it out, you won't be disappointed.   Full Review   
 Fun and works well Only really complaint is paying $2 per character seems a bit high to have options.   Full Review   
 High quality game that deserves way more download! Played the free version like a year ago (maybe more) and really liked the game. But there were always some little things that were bugging me, especially the fact that the characters were moving too slow. I guess there was really something special about the game since a year later, I still had that game in my head and just decided to buy the game anyway. Was I ever surprised when I started playing! The characters were now moving fast and the interface itself became more polished. I soon learned that the Trese Brothers were very good at regularly updating the game (even though they've also got newer ones to work on). All my complaints have been solved and what I'm left with is a superbe tactical RPG with intense combat and interesting skill system as well as an interesting story to follow. It's a shame the game is not more recognized.   Full Review   
 Hero's of Steel Reminds me of old school dark sun games. I love this game and play it every chance I get.   Full Review   
 Great TRPG Good variety in skills allows you to set up very unique and differing parties even without purchasing any of the alternative characters. You're nearly constantly fighting nontrash quality enemies, which is what you want to do when you're playing a game. You can always try out the free version to see if it's your cup of tea.   Full Review   
 Best turn based rpg I downloaded this as soon as it came out and have played several different teams. The story is great and the game play is outstanding.   Full Review   
 Best game I own. Period. I've been playing HoS since day one, and after purchasing every new character, have played well over 150 unique and powerful groups using the 8 available characters. Not every group has what it takes, and therein lies the replayability of the game. With every group, you learn what works and what doesn't, improving with every play through. One of my favorite parts of this game is the constant combat- minus backtracking, combat accounts for 75% of the game, and makes for a great experience!   Full Review   
 Very nice game. They should be making more games like this one.   Full Review   
 Well worth the money Great storyline, fun development, and neat class abilities.   A tiny bit slow on my phone, but well worth it.   Full Review   
  That the authors answer the forum so often is what pushed me from 4 -5 stars... dungeon crawl but missingnwandering monsters... no grinder areas and a night at the inn can get awfully far away....   Full Review   
 Tactical dungeon romp Quite a fun albeit linear strategy RPG. Visually unimpressive (amateur artwork) but hits all the right notes with a very large underworld to carve your way through,  supported by a passable narrative. Worth supporting. Minus 2 stars for lack of a cloud save option, hours of playtime down the drain with switching to a new device.   Full Review   
  Reminds me a lot of Shining Force but more involved. Not necessarily good or bad in being more involved. I don't feel like they complicate it too much. Lots of fun and well worth 2$.   Full Review   
 addicting! i love this game,i wish the price of additional character cheaper,though   Full Review   
 Great rpg!! Thanks Cory!!! 😉 I still love this game!!!   Full Review   
 Great developers Arguably the best mobile rpg out there. Definitely the best I've playes.   Full Review   
  Great old school RPG   Full Review   
 Yet again Yet again another success by the trese's.   Full Review   
 Way-back Machine Good Times! Remember the good old days when everything was less complicated? When you didnt have to read a dictionary sized book to play a game?   And when RPG games have good storylines? This game takes you back to that time, in spades.  I cannot recommend  this game highly enough!   Full Review
title: Heroes of Steel RPG Elite
